Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
function isFriend(testid, steamid) -- is steamid a friend of testid?
if testid == nil then return false end
if friends[testid] == nil then -- testid is missing from friends data return false end
if friends[testid].friends == nil then -- testid has no friends return false end
if string.find(friends[testid].friends, steamid) then -- found steamid in testid's friends list. return true end
-- steamid is not a friend of testid return false end
function message(msg, irc) -- parse msg and enclose the actual message in double quotes words = {} for word in msg:gmatch("%S+") do table.insert(words, word) end
if words[1] == "say" then -- say the message in public chat send("say \"" .. string.sub(msg, 5) .. "\"") else -- if the recipient of the message hasn't disabled bot messages, private message them if players[words[2]].silentBob == false then send("pm " .. words[2] .. " \"" .. string.sub(msg, 21) .. "\"") end
if irc ~= nil then -- send a copy of the pm to irc irc_QueueMsg(irc, "pm to " .. words[2] .. " " .. string.sub(msg, 21)) end end end
function pvpZone(x, z) -- is the coord x,z a pvp zone? for k, v in pairs(locations) do if (v.pvp) then -- if the coord is inside this pvp location, return the location name if math.abs(v.x-x) <= (tonumber(v.size)) and math.abs(v.z-z) <= (tonumber(v.size)) then return v.name end end end
return false end
function inLocation(x, z) -- is the coord inside a location? local closestLocation, closestDistance, dist, reset
-- since locations can exist inside other locations, work out which location centre is closest closestDistance = 100000 reset = false
for k, v in pairs(locations) do if v.size ~= nil then if math.abs(v.x-x) <= tonumber(v.size) and math.abs(v.z-z) <= tonumber(v.size) then dist = distancexz(x, z, v.x, v.z)
if tonumber(dist) < tonumber(closestDistance) then closestLocation = v.name closestDistance = dist reset = v.resetZone end end else if math.abs(v.x-x) < 15 and math.abs(v.z-z) < 15 then dist = distancexz(x, z, v.x, v.z)
if dist < closestDistance then closestLocation = v.name closestDistance = dist reset = v.resetZone end end end end
if closestLocation ~= nil then return closestLocation, reset else return false, false end end
function LookupArenaPlayer(id) -- is id in the arenaPlayers table? for k, v in pairs(arenaPlayers) do if (id == v.id) then return k end end end
function LookupPlayer(search, match) -- try to find the player amoung those who are playing right now local id
search = string.lower(search)
if string.starts(search, "\"") and string.ends(search,"\"") then search = search:match("%w+") match = "all" end
for k, v in pairs(igplayers) do if search == v.id then -- matched the player id return k end
if k == search then -- matched the steam id return k end
if (v.name ~= nil) then if match == "all" then -- look for an exact match if (search == string.lower(v.name)) then return k end
if (v.ircAlias ~= nil) and (search == string.lower(v.ircAlias)) then return k end else -- if it contains the search it is a match if (search == string.lower(v.name)) or (string.find(string.lower(v.name), search)) then return k end
if (string.find(v.id, search)) then return k end end end end
-- no matches so try again but including all players id = LookupOfflinePlayer(search, match)
-- if id isn't nil we found a match if id ~= nil then return id end end
function LookupOfflinePlayer(search, match) search = string.lower(search)
if string.starts(search, "\"") and string.ends(search,"\"") then search = search:match("%w+") match = "all" end
for k, v in pairs(players) do if (v.name ~= nil) then if match == "all" then if (search == string.lower(v.name)) then return k end
if (v.ircAlias ~= nil) and (search == string.lower(v.ircAlias)) then return k end else if (search == string.lower(v.name)) or (string.find(string.lower(v.name), search)) then return k end end end
if search == v.id then return k end
if k == search then return k end end
return nil end
function LookupIRCPass(pass) -- is this pass in use? pass = string.lower(pass)
for k, v in pairs(players) do if (v.ircPass ~= nil) then if (pass == string.lower(v.ircPass)) then return k end end end end
function LookupLocation(command) -- is command the name of a location? command = string.lower(command)
if (string.find(command, "/") == 1) then command = string.sub(command, 2) -- strip off the leading / end
for k, v in pairs(locations) do if (command == string.lower(v.name)) then return k end end end
function LookupTeleportByName(tpname) -- find a teleport by its name tpname = string.lower(tpname)
for k, v in pairs(teleports) do if (tpname == string.lower(v.name)) then return k end end end
function LookupTeleport(x,y,z) -- is this 3D coord inside a teleport? match = 0
for k, v in pairs(teleports) do if ((math.abs(math.abs(x) - math.abs(v.x)) < 1) and (math.abs(math.abs(y) - math.abs(v.y)) < 1) and (math.abs(math.abs(z) - math.abs(v.z)) < 1)) then match = 1 return k end
if(v.dx) then if ((math.abs(math.abs(x) - math.abs(v.dx)) < 1) and (math.abs(math.abs(y) - math.abs(v.dy)) < 1) and (math.abs(math.abs(z) - math.abs(v.dz)) < 1)) then match = 2 return k end end end end
function ClosestHotspot(x, y, z) -- what is the closest hotspot to this 3D coord? local closest = 1000 local dist = 2000 local spot = 0
for k, v in pairs(hotspots) do dist = distancexyz(x, y, z, v.x, v.y, v.z)
if (dist < closest) and (dist < 21) then closest = dist spot = k end end
if (spot ~= 0) then return spot end end
function LookupVillager(steam, village) -- is steam a member of village? if villagers[steam .. village] ~= nil then return true else return false end end
function tablelength(T) -- helper function to count the members of a Lua table local count = 0 for _ in pairs(T) do count = count + 1 end return count end
function getRegion(xpos,zpos) -- build the region name from the coords. Each region is a physical file in the saves folder local x local z
x = math.floor(xpos / 512) z = math.floor(zpos / 512) return "r." .. x .. "." .. z .. ".7rg", x, z end
function squareDistanceXZXZ(x1, z1, x2, z2, distance) -- calculate the square distance between 2 coords if math.abs(x2-x1) > tonumber(distance) or math.abs(z2-z1) > tonumber(distance) then return true else return false end end
function squareDistance(x, z, distance) -- another square distance calculation if math.abs(x) > tonumber(distance) or math.abs(z) > tonumber(distance) then return true else return false end end
function compare(a,b) -- simple sort return a[1] < b[1] end
function distancexyz( x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2 ) -- calc the distance between 2 points in 3D local dx = x2 - x1 local dy = y2 - y1 local dz = z2 - z1 return math.sqrt((dx * dx) + (dy * dy) + (dz * dz)) end
function distancexz(x1, z1, x2, z2) -- calc the distance between 2 points in 2D (xz) local dx = x1 - x2 local dz = z1 - z2 return math.sqrt(dx * dx + dz * dz) end
function distance( x1, y1, x2, y2 ) -- calc the distance between 2 xy coords local dx = x1 - x2 local dy = y1 - y2 return math.sqrt( dx * dx + dy * dy ) end
function say(message) -- just a catcher for old code send(message) return end
function ToInt(number) return math.floor(tonumber(number) or nil) end
function getAngle(x1, z1, x2, z2) -- Returns the angle between two points. return math.atan2(z2-z1, x2-x1) end
function getCompass(x1, z1, x2, z2) -- given 2 pairs of coordinates (the player and something else), determine where it is on a compass in relation to the player. local direction local angle local testangle local increment local index
direction = { "south west","south","south east","east", "north east","north","north west","west" }
angle = getAngle(x1, z1, x2, z2)
increment = (2 * math.pi) / 8 testangle = -math.pi + increment index = 1
while angle > tonumber(testangle) do index = index + 1 if(index > 8) then return direction[1] --roll over end
testangle = testangle + increment end
return direction[index] end
function accessLevel(pid) -- determine the access level of the player
if owners[pid] then players[pid].accessLevel = 0 return 0 end
if admins[pid] then players[pid].accessLevel = 1 return 1 end
if mods[pid] then players[pid].accessLevel = 2 return 2 end
-- 3 is reserved for visiting admins
if players[pid].donor == true then --TODO: Add donor levels players[pid].accessLevel = 10 return 10 end
-- anyone stripped of certain rights if players[pid].denyRights == true then players[pid].accessLevel = 99 return 99 end
-- regulars if igplayers[pid] then if tonumber(players[pid].timeOnServer) + tonumber(igplayers[pid].sessionPlaytime) > (server.newPlayerTimer * 60) then players[pid].accessLevel = 90 return 90 end else if tonumber(players[pid].timeOnServer) > (server.newPlayerTimer * 60) then players[pid].accessLevel = 90 return 90 end end
-- new players players[pid].accessLevel = 99 return 99 end

Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
-- useful reference: luapower.com/mysql
mysql = require "luasql.mysql"
function rand(high, low, real) -- generate a random number using MySQL if low == nil then low = 1 end
if real == nil then cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select floor(RAND()*(" .. high .. "-" .. low .. ")+" .. low .. ") as rnum") else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select RAND()*(" .. high .. "-" .. low .. ")+" .. low .. " as rnum") end
row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") return tonumber(row.rnum) end
function nextID(table, idfield) local cursor, row, errorString
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT MAX(" .. idfield .. ") as lastid FROM " .. table) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
if row.id ~= nil then nextid = tonumber(row.lastid) + 1 else nextid = 1 end
cursor:close() return nextid end
function dbBaseDefend(steam, base) -- experimental local cursor, errorString,row, dist
dist = distancexz(igplayers[steam].xPos, igplayers[steam].zPos, players[base].homeX, players[base].homeZ)
if dist < server.baseSize then cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT x, y, z FROM tracker WHERE steam = " .. steam .." AND (abs(x - " .. players[base].homeX .. ") > " .. server.baseSize .. " AND abs(z - " .. players[base].homeZ .. ") > " .. server.baseSize .. ") AND (abs(x - " .. players[base].homeX .. ") < " .. server.baseSize + 40 .. " AND abs(z - " .. players[base].homeZ .. ") < " .. server.baseSize + 40 .. ") ORDER BY trackerid DESC Limit 0, 50") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do cmd = ("tele " .. steam .. " " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y .. " " .. row.z) teleport(cmd)
if true then return end
row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end end end
function escape(string) -- always escape your strings!
if string == nil then return "" else return conn:escape(string) end end
function dbTrue(value) -- translate db true false to Lua true false if value == "0" then return false else return true end end
function dbYN(value) -- translate db true false to Lua true false if value == "0" then return "No" else return "Yes" end end
function dbBool(value) -- translate Lua true false to db 1 or 0 if value == false then return 0 else return 1 end end
function initDB() conn:execute("DELETE FROM ircQueue") conn:execute("DELETE FROM memTracker") conn:execute("DELETE FROM messageQueue") conn:execute("DELETE FROM commandQueue") conn:execute("DELETE FROM gimmeQueue") conn:execute("DELETE FROM searchResults") end
function closeDB() conn:close() connBots:close() env:close() end
function openDB() lastAction = "Open Database" env = mysql.mysql() -- EDIT ME! conn = env:connect("testbot", "testbot", serverDBPassword) -- EDIT ME! connBots = env:connect("bots", "bots", botsDBPassword)
alterTables() initDB() end
function importBlacklist() local cursor, cursor2, errorString, row
cursor,errorString = connBots:execute("SELECT * FROM IPBlacklist") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do cursor2,errorString = conn:execute("INSERT INTO IPBlacklist (StartIP, EndIP) values (" .. row.StartIP .. "," .. row.EndIP .. ")") row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
cursor:close() cursor2:close() end
function importBadItems() local cursor, cursor2, errorString, row
conn:execute("DELETE FROM badItems")
cursor,errorString = connBots:execute("SELECT * FROM badItems") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do cursor2,errorString = conn:execute("INSERT INTO badItems (item, action) values ('" .. escape(row.item) .. "','" .. row.action .. "')") row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
cursor:close() cursor2:close() end
function alterTables() conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `hotspots` CHANGE `size` `size` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2'") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `hotspots` ADD `idx` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0'") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `keystones` ADD `removed` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1'") conn:execute("DROP TABLE `languages`") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `locations` ADD `resetZone` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0'") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `players` DROP `teleCooldown`") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `server` ADD `gameType` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pve'") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `players` ADD `donorLevel` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , ADD `donorExpiry` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `locations` ADD `other` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `server` ADD `hideCommands` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `locations` ADD `killZombies` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `players` ADD `autoFriend` VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'NA/AF/AD'") conn:execute("ALTER TABLE `server` ADD `botTick` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0'") end
function readBotTick() local cursor, errorString, row
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select botTick from server") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
if row then return tonumber(row.botTick) end
cursor:close() end
function writeBotTick() if botTick == nil then botTick = 0 end
botTick = tonumber(botTick) + 1 conn:execute("update server set botTick = " .. botTick) end
function checkBotTick() local tick
tick = readBotTick()
if tick ~= botTick then botDisabled = true dbug("Another bot has been detected. This bot has been disabled.") irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "Another bot has been detected. This bot has been disabled. Do not run multiples of the same bot!") disconnect() end end

Script.name: gmsg_base
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ base commands ============= set base size setbed setbase protect base delbase protectbase unprotectbase setbase <player> pause resume test base --]]
function gmsg_base() calledFunction = "gmsg_base"
local id, pname, psize, words, word, dist, debug, dist1, dist2, wait, loc, reset
debug = false
if debug then dbug("debug base 0") end
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
--working if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "base2") and gmsgvars.words[3] == "size") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") gmsgvars.faultyGMSG = false return true end end
pname = "" words = {} for word in gmsgvars.command:gmatch("%w+") do table.insert(words, word) end
id = LookupPlayer(gmsgvars.words[5]) if (players[id]) then pname = players[id].name end
psize = string.match(gmsgvars.command, " (%d+)") psize = tonumber(psize)
if (pname == "") then faultyGMSG = false return end
if (gmsgvars.words[2] == "base") then if (players[id]) then players[id].protectSize = psize end message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "] " .. players[id].name .."'s base is protected to " .. psize .. " metres from their base teleport[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET protectSize = " .. psize .. " WHERE steam = " .. id) else if (accessLevel(id) < 11) then if (players[id]) then players[id].protect2Size = psize end message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "] " .. players[id].name .."'s 2nd base is protected to " .. psize .. " metres from their base teleport[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET protect2Size = " .. psize .. " WHERE steam = " .. id) end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "setbed") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/setbed makes your nearest base your spawn point after you die.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Unlike a real bed, this can't be broken or stolen. Also it doesn't show up on the map or compass.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Use it within 50 metres of your base.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end --working if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbed") then dist = distancexz(gmsgvars.intX, gmsgvars.intZ, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ) if dist < 50 then players[gmsgvars.playerid].bed = "base1" message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You will respawn at your first base after death.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET bed = 'base1' WHERE steam = " .. id) end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX ~= 0 and players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ ~= 0) then dist = distancexz(gmsgvars.intX, gmsgvars.intZ, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z) if dist < 50 then players[gmsgvars.playerid].bed = "base2" message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You will respawn at your second base after death.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET bed = 'base2' WHERE steam = " .. id) end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 2") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "sethome" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "setbase" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "sethome2" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "setbase2") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/setbase (/setbase2) tells the bot where your base(s) are so the bot can defend them and alert you and admins to raids.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]It is also used by /base to teleport you back to the spot where /setbase is done.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can and should set base protection next. Type /man protect for info.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "sethome" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbase" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "sethome2" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbase2") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].timeout == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are in timeout. Trust me, you don't want your base here.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
loc, reset = inLocation(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos)
if resetRegions[gmsgvars.region] or reset then -- and (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2 or server.ignoreAdmins == false) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are in a reset zone. Do not set your base here. It will be deleted when this zone is reset.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if not validPosition(gmsgvars.playerid, true) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
for k, v in pairs(locations) do if v.village == nil then dist = distance(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, locations[k].x, locations[k].z)
if locations[k].size ~= nil then psize = locations[k].size else psize = server.baseSize end
if v.allowBase == true then psize = 0 end
if dist <= tonumber(psize) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too close to a location. You are not allowed to set your base here.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect == true and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then for k, v in pairs(igplayers) do if (accessLevel(k) < 3) then if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "sethome" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbase") then message("pm " .. k .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. "'s base is no longer protected.[-]") message("pm " .. k .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Type playerbase " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " to tp there and re-activate base protection if appropriate.[-]") else message("pm " .. k .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. "'s 2nd base is no longer protected.[-]") message("pm " .. k .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Type playerbase2 " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " to tp there and re-activate base protection if appropriate.[-]") end end end end
-- set the players home coords if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "sethome" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbase") then players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeY = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ = gmsgvars.intZ players[gmsgvars.playerid].exitX = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].exitY = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].exitZ = gmsgvars.intZ players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This is your new home location.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET homeX = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", homeY = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", homeZ = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", exitX = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", exitY = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", exitZ = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", protect = 0 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) conn:execute("INSERT INTO events (x, y, z, serverTime, type, event, steam) VALUES (" .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ",'" .. serverTime .. "','setbase','Player " .. escape(players[gmsgvars.playerid].name) .. " set a base'," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ")") removeInvalidHotspots(gmsgvars.playerid) else if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 11 then players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Y = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z = gmsgvars.intZ players[gmsgvars.playerid].exit2X = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].exit2Y = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].exit2Z = gmsgvars.intZ players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2 = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This is the location of your 2nd base.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET home2X = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", home2Y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", home2Z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", exit2X = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", exit2Y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", exit2Z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", protect2 = 0 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) removeInvalidHotspots(gmsgvars.playerid) else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have 2 bases. Consider donating. =D[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Please let us know if you are still seeing this message after donating.[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 3") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "protect") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/protect defends your base from raiders by teleporting them out.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]From you base tp type /protect then just walk away from your base. The bot will do the rest.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can /pause and /resume protection or permanently allow friends in by friending them with /friend[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect2" and not players[gmsgvars.playerid].prisoner and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= "village") then -- allow base protection after player has played 30 minutes if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].newPlayer == true) and (players[gmsgvars.playerid].timeOnServer + igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].sessionPlaytime < 1800) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is not available to you yet. It will be automatically unlocked soon.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
id = gmsgvars.playerid
if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 4) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "protect") + 8) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) end
if not validPosition(gmsgvars.playerid, true) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect" then dist = distance(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[id].homeX, players[id].homeZ) else dist = distance(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[id].home2X, players[id].home2Z) end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect") then if (tonumber(dist) < tonumber(players[id].protectSize) + 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too close to the base, but just walk away and I will set it when you are far enough away.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = id igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = 1 faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (tonumber(dist) > tonumber(players[id].protectSize) + 20) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too far from the base, but just walk towards the base and I will set it when you are close enough.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = id igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = 1 faultyGMSG = false return true end
players[id].exitX = gmsgvars.intX players[id].exitY = gmsgvars.intY players[id].exitZ = gmsgvars.intZ
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET exitX = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", exitY = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", exitZ = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE steam = " .. id)
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = nil
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have set an exit teleport for " .. players[id].name .. "'s base.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have set an exit teleport for your base.[-]") end
-- check for nearby bases failProtect = false for k, v in pairs(players) do if (v.homeX ~= nil) and k ~= id then if (v.homeX ~= 0 and v.homeZ ~= 0) then dist = distancexz(players[id].homeX, players[id].homeZ, v.homeX, v.homeZ)
if (tonumber(dist) < tonumber(players[id].protectSize)) then if not isFriend(k, id) then failProtect = true end end end end
if (v.home2X ~= nil) then if (v.home2X ~= 0 and v.home2Z ~= 0) then dist = distancexz(players[id].homeX, players[id].homeZ, v.home2X, v.home2Z)
if (dist < players[id].protectSize + 10) then if not isFriend(k, id) then failProtect = true end end end end end
if failProtect == false then players[id].protect = true message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Base protection for your base is active.[-]") else message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base is too close to another player base who is not on your friends list. Protection cannot be enabled.[-]") end else if (tonumber(dist) < tonumber(players[id].protect2Size) + 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too close to the base, but just walk away and I will set it when you are far enough away.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = id igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = 2 faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (tonumber(dist) > tonumber(players[id].protect2Size) + 20) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too far from the base, but just walk towards the base and I will set it when you are close enough.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = id igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = 2 faultyGMSG = false return true end
players[id].exit2X = gmsgvars.intX players[id].exit2Y = gmsgvars.intY players[id].exit2Z = gmsgvars.intZ
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET exit2X = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", exit2Y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", exit2Z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE steam = " .. id)
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseExit = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBaseID = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertBase = nil
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have set an exit teleport for " .. players[id].name .. "'s 2nd base.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have set an exit teleport for your 2nd base.[-]") end
-- check for nearby bases failProtect = false for k, v in pairs(players) do if (v.homeX) and (v.homeX ~= 0 and v.homeZ ~= 0) then dist = distancexz(players[id].home2X, players[id].home2Z, v.homeX, v.homeZ)
if (dist < players[id].protectSize2 + 10) then if not isFriend(k, id) then failProtect = true end end end
if (v.home2X) and (v.home2X ~= 0 and v.home2Z ~= 0) then dist = distancexz(players[id].home2X, players[id].home2Z, v.home2X, v.home2Z)
if (dist < players[id].protectSize2 + 10) then if not isFriend(k, id) then failProtect = true end end end end
if failProtect == false then players[id].protect2 = true message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Base protection for your second base is active.[-]") else message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base is too close to another player base who is not on your friends list. Protection cannot be enabled.[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "home") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Teleport back to your base with /base or /home.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]After using /base there is a delay set by the server owner before you can use it again.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Also the base teleport disables /return so you have to walk to return to where you were.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "homer" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Doh![-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "base2" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home2") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) and (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base2" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home2") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors can have 2 base teleports and base protections. Consider donating =D[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4a") end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].timeout == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are in timeout. Wait for an admin to /return you.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4b") end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].prisoner or not players[gmsgvars.playerid].canTeleport) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are not allowed to use teleports.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home") and (players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeY == 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have not set a base yet. Type /setbase in your base first then /base will work.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 11) then if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base2" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home2") and (players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Y == 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have not set a 2nd base yet. Type /setbase2 in your base first then /base2 will work.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4c") end
wait = true
if gmsgvars.intY > 0 then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].walkies == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have not opted in to using teleports. Type /enabletp to opt-in.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4d") end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].newPlayer == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is not available to new players. It will be automatically unlocked after a couple of hours of play.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
dist1 = distancexz(players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ) dist2 = distancexz(players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z)
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home") and (tonumber(dist1) < 201) then wait = false end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base2" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home2") and (tonumber(dist2) < 201) then wait = false end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 3) then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown - os.time() > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have to wait " .. os.date("%M minutes %S seconds",players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown - os.time()) .. " before you can use /base again.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4h") end
-- first record the current x y z if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation = "" savePosition(gmsgvars.playerid) else igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation = "" players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld = 0 end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4i") end
if wait then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].donor == true then players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown = (os.time() + math.floor(server.baseCooldown / 2)) else players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown = (os.time() + server.baseCooldown) end end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4j") end
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET xPosOld = " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld .. ", yPosOld = " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld .. ", zPosOld = " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld .. ", baseCooldown = " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown .. " WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
if debug then dbug("debug base 4k") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "base" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "home") then cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeY + 1 .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ else cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Y + 1 .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z end
if wait then prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd) else send(cmd) end
if debug then dbug("debug base 4l") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 6\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "delbase") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/delbase will make the bot forget your base which also removes base protection.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]If you are moving your base you can just type /setbase at the new location.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "delbase") then id = gmsgvars.playerid
if (gmsgvars.playername == "Server") or (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "delbase") + 8) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) if id == nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player found called " .. pname .. "[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "No player found called " .. pname) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
players[id].homeX = 0 players[id].homeY = 0 players[id].homeZ = 0 players[id].protect = false
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET homeX = 0, homeY = 0, homeZ = 0, protect = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
if id == gmsgvars.playerid then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base and base protection has been removed.[-]") else if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. "'s base and base protection has been removed.[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, players[id].name .. "'s base and base protection has been removed.") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 7\n") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "delbase2" and (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 4) then id = gmsgvars.playerid
if (gmsgvars.playername == "Server") or (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "delbase2") + 9) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) if id == nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player found called " .. pname .. "[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "No player found called " .. pname) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
players[id].home2X = 0 players[id].home2Y = 0 players[id].home2Z = 0 players[id].protect2 = false
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET home2X = 0, home2Y = 0, home2Z = 0, protect2 = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
if id == gmsgvars.playerid then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your 2nd base and base protection has been removed.[-]") else if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. "'s 2nd base and base protection has been removed.[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, players[id].name .. "'s 2nd base and base protection has been removed.") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 8\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "unprotectbase" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "unprotectbase2") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "unprotectbase") + 14) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname)
if (pname == nil or pname == "") then faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "unprotectbase") then if (players[id]) then players[id].protect = false end conn:execute("UPDATE players SET protect = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "] " .. players[id].name .."'s base is no longer protected[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, players[id].name .."'s base is no longer protected.") end else if (players[id].donor == true or (accessLevel(id) < 4)) then if (players[id]) then players[id].protect2 = false end conn:execute("UPDATE players SET protect2 = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "] " .. players[id].name .."'s 2nd base is no longer protected[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, players[id].name .."'s 2nd base is no longer protected.") end else if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins are allowed 2 base protections[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "Only donors and admins are allowed 2 base protections.") end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 11\n") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then display ("debug base 12\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "setbase" and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) and not players[gmsgvars.playerid].prisoner then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Type setbase without anything after it.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
pname = gmsgvars.words[gmsgvars.wordCount] pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname)
if not validPosition(gmsgvars.playerid, true) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (id ~= nil) then players[id].homeX = gmsgvars.intX players[id].homeY = gmsgvars.intY players[id].homeZ = gmsgvars.intZ players[id].protectSize = server.baseSize message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. "'s base has been set at where you are standing.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET protectSize = " .. server.baseSize .. ", homeX = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", homeY = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", homeZ = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE steam = " .. id) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 13\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "test" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "base") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Test your base protection for 30 seconds.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can also check your base with /status[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "test" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "base") then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect == false and players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2 == false then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't have base protection established now. Type /protect at your base or /protect2 at your 2nd base to set it up first.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].protectTest = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].protectTestEnd = os.time() + 30
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base protection is active and will keep you out for 30 seconds.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "pause") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can temporarily give access to your base with /pause.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Protection will automatically resume if you move more than 100 metres away or log off.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "pause" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "paws") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then pname = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect == false) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't have base protection established now. An admin is required to set it up or re-establish it.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
dist = distancexz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ) if (dist < tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].protectSize) + 100) then players[gmsgvars.playerid].protectPaused = true else players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2Paused = true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base protection is disabled while you are within 100 meters of your /base teleport.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base 14\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "resume") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Visitors won't leave? Resume your base protection and watch them leave.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "resume") then pname = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name
dist = distancexz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z) if (dist < tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].protectSize) + 100) then players[gmsgvars.playerid].protectPaused = nil
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your base protection is now active.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't have base protection. An admin can set up or re-establish it for you.[-]") end else players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2Paused = nil
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2 == true) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your second base's protection is now active.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't have base protection on your second base. An admin can set up or re-establish it for you.[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug base end\n") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_admin
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ add /claims <distance> it will count all claims (using llp) within range. add /claim owners <distance> will list all the players with claims down in range update /tp so it accepts coords admin commands ============= reload bot timeout return <player> release give claim hordeme leave claims remove claims exile free player <player> is not new add donor remove donor give disallow teleport allow teleport enable waypoints disable waypoints close shop open shop set shop open set shop close set shop location clear shop location ignore player include player prisoner arrest resettimers exclude admins include admins freeze unfreeze move sendhome watch <player> stop watching send <player1> to <player2> who visited bases admin add admin remove goto <player> offline players nearby crimescene <player> near <player> add bad item remove bad item bad items add restricted item remove restricted item restricted items prisoners equip admin release here playerbase --]]
function gmsg_admin() calledFunction = "gmsg_admin"
local debug, tmp, str
debug = false tmp = {}
if debug then dbug("debug admin") end
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "reload" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "refresh" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "update") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "bot" then -- run admin list, gg, ban list and lkp
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Collecting known players[-]") send("lkp")
tempTimer( 4, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reading admin list[-]")]] ) tempTimer( 4, [[send("admin list")]] )
tempTimer( 6, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reading bans[-]")]] ) tempTimer( 6, [[send("ban list")]] )
tempTimer( 8, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reading server config[-]")]] ) tempTimer( 8, [[send("gg")]] )
tempTimer( 10, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reading claims[-]")]]) tempTimer( 10, [[send("llp)]] )
tempTimer( 13, [[send("pm IPCHECK")]] ) tempTimer( 13, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reload complete.[-]")]] )
faultyGMSG = false return true
end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "admin" and server.botName == "Tester" then -- add the steamid to the admins table admins[players[gmsgvars.playerid].steam] = {} players[gmsgvars.playerid].newPlayer = false players[gmsgvars.playerid].silentBob = false players[gmsgvars.playerid].walkies = false players[gmsgvars.playerid].exiled = 2 players[gmsgvars.playerid].canTeleport = true players[gmsgvars.playerid].botHelp = true
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " has been given admin powers[-]") send("admin add " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " 0")
tempTimer( 2, [[send("admin list")]] )
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("admin 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "timeout") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 90) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Send a player to timeout where they can only talk.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can also send yourself to timeout but not other staff.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/timeout <player>[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]See also: /return <player>[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
tmp = {} tmp.pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "timeout ") + 8) tmp.pname = string.trim(tmp.pname) tmp.id = LookupPlayer(tmp.pname)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (players[tmp.id].newPlayer == false and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are limited to sending new players to timeout. " .. players[tmp.id].name .. " is not new.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (players[tmp.id].timeout == true) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This player is already in timeout. Did you mean /return ?[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "Player " .. tmp.id .. " " .. players[tmp.id].name .. " is already in timeout.") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(tmp.id) < 3 and server.ignoreAdmins == true) and tmp.id ~= gmsgvars.playerid then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Staff can not be sent to timeout.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- first record their current x y z players[tmp.id].timeout = true players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout = math.floor(players[tmp.id].xPos) players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout = math.ceil(players[tmp.id].yPos) players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout = math.floor(players[tmp.id].zPos)
conn:execute("INSERT INTO events (x, y, z, serverTime, type, event, steam) VALUES (" .. players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout .. "," .. players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout .. "," .. players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout .. ",'" .. serverTime .. "','timeout','Player " .. escape(players[tmp.id].name) .. " SteamID: " .. tmp.id .. " sent to timeout by " .. escape(players[gmsgvars.playerid].name) .. "'," .. tmp.id .. ")")
-- then teleport the player to timeout send("tele " .. tmp.id .. " " .. players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout .. " -5000 " .. players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout)
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. igplayers[tmp.id].name .. " has been sent to timeout.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 1, xPosTimeout = " .. players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout .. ", yPosTimeout = " .. players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout .. ", zPosTimeout = " .. players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout .. " WHERE steam = " .. tmp.id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("admin 2") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "return" and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 90) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted. Just type /return.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tmp = {}
if string.find(gmsgvars.command, " to ") then tmp.loc = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " to ") + 4) tmp.loc = string.trim(tmp.loc) tmp.loc = LookupLocation(tmp.loc)
tmp.pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "return ") + 7, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " to ") - 1) tmp.pname = string.trim(tmp.pname) tmp.id = LookupPlayer(tmp.pname) else tmp.pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "return ") + 7) tmp.pname = string.trim(tmp.pname) tmp.id = LookupPlayer(tmp.pname) end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then -- don't allow players to return anyone to a different location. if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then tmp.loc = nil end end
if (players[tmp.id].timeout == true and tmp.id == gmsgvars.playerid and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are in timeout. You cannot release yourself.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if players[tmp.id].timeout == false and players[tmp.id].prisoner and ((tmp.id ~= gmsgvars.playerid and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) or gmsgvars.playerid == players[id].pvpVictim) then message("say release " .. players[tmp.id].name) faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (players[tmp.id].timeout == true and players[tmp.id].newPlayer == false and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can only use this command on new players.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
-- return player to previously recorded x y z if (igplayers[tmp.id]) then if (players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout) then players[tmp.id].timeout = false players[tmp.id].botTimeout = false players[tmp.id].freeze = false
igplayers[tmp.id].skipExcessInventory = true
if tmp.loc ~= nil then tmp.cmd = "tele " .. tmp.id .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].x .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].y .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].z else send("tele " .. tmp.id .. " " .. players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout .. " " .. players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout .. " " .. players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout)
players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout = 0 players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout = 0 players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout = 0
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 0, botTimeout = 0, xPosTimeout = 0, yPosTimeout = 0, zPosTimeout = 0 WHERE steam = " .. tmp.id)
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. "[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
prepareTeleport(tmp.id, tmp.cmd) teleport(tmp.cmd, true)
players[tmp.id].xPosTimeout = 0 players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout = 0 players[tmp.id].zPosTimeout = 0
if tmp.loc ~= nil then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. " to " .. tmp.loc .. "[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. "[-]") end
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 0, botTimeout = 0, xPosTimeout = 0, yPosTimeout = 0, zPosTimeout = 0 WHERE steam = " .. tmp.id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (players[tmp.id].yPosOld > 0) then players[tmp.id].timeout = false players[tmp.id].botTimeout = false
if tmp.loc ~= nil then tmp.cmd = "tele " .. tmp.id .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].x .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].y .. " " .. locations[tmp.loc].z else cmd = "tele " .. tmp.id .. " " .. players[tmp.id].xPosOld .. " " .. players[tmp.id].yPosOld .. " " .. players[tmp.id].zPosOld end
prepareTeleport(tmp.id, tmp.cmd) teleport(tmp.cmd, true)
players[tmp.id].xPosOld = 0 players[tmp.id].yPosOld = 0 players[tmp.id].zPosOld = 0
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 0, botTimeout = 0, xPosOld = 0, yPosOld = 0, zPosOld = 0 WHERE steam = " .. tmp.id)
if tmp.loc ~= nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. " to " .. tmp.loc .. "[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. " to " .. tmp.loc .. "[-]") end else if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. "[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Returning " .. players[tmp.id].name .. "[-]") end end end else if (players[tmp.id].yPosTimeout) then players[tmp.id].timeout = false players[tmp.id].botTimeout = false players[tmp.id].location = "return player"
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[tmp.id].name .. " will be returned when they next join the server.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 0, botTimeout = 0 WHERE steam = " .. tmp.id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("admin 3") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "release" or (gmsgvars.words[1] == "just" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "release")) then prisoner = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "release ") + 8) prisoner = string.trim(prisoner) prisonerid = LookupPlayer(prisoner) prisoner = players[prisonerid].name
if prisonerid == nil then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]We don't have a prisoner called " .. prisoner .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and players[gmsgvars.playerid].pvpVictim == 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is for admins and the PVP victim only[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and (tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].pvpVictim) > 0) and (prisonerid ~= players[gmsgvars.playerid].pvpVictim) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. prisoner .. " is not in prison for your death and cannot be released by you.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (players[prisonerid].timeout == true or players[prisonerid].botTimeout == true) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Citizen " .. prisoner .. " is released from timeout.[-]") players[prisonerid].timeout = false players[prisonerid].botTimeout = false players[prisonerid].freeze = false
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET timeout = 0, botTimeout = 0 WHERE steam = " .. prisonerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (not players[prisonerid].prisoner and players[prisonerid].timeout == false) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Citizen " .. prisoner .. " is not a prisoner[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
players[prisonerid].xPosOld = 0 players[prisonerid].yPosOld = 0 players[prisonerid].zPosOld = 0
if (igplayers[prisonerid]) then message("say Releasing prisoner " .. prisoner) message("pm " .. prisonerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are released from prison. Be a good citizen if you wish to remain free.[-]")
if (gmsgvars.words[1] ~= "just") then if (players[prisonerid].prisonxPosOld) then cmd = "tele " .. prisonerid .. " " .. players[prisonerid].prisonxPosOld .. " " .. players[prisonerid].prisonyPosOld .. " " .. players[prisonerid].prisonzPosOld igplayers[prisonerid].lastTP = cmd prepareTeleport(prisonerid, cmd) teleport(cmd, true) end else message("pm " .. prisonerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are a free citizen, but you must find your own way back.[-]") end else if (players[prisonerid]) then players[prisonerid].location = "return player" message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[prisonerid].name .. " will be released when they next join the server.[-]")
players[prisonerid].xPosOld = players[prisonerid].prisonxPosOld players[prisonerid].yPosOld = players[prisonerid].prisonyPosOld players[prisonerid].zPosOld = players[prisonerid].prisonzPosOld
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET prisoner = 0, location = 'return player', xPosOld = " .. players[prisonerid].prisonxPosOld .. ", yPosOld = " .. players[prisonerid].prisonyPosOld .. ", zPosOld = " .. players[prisonerid].prisonzPosOld .. " WHERE steam = " .. prisonerid) end end
players[prisonerid].prisoner = false
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("admin 4") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "give" and (string.find(gmsgvars.words[2], "claim") or string.find(gmsgvars.words[2], "key") or string.find(gmsgvars.words[2], "lcb")) then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].removedClaims > 5 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I am holding a lot of claims. Due to bugs with the count I can't release them to you. Please talk to an admin to get them back so we can verify the count.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
