--[[ fun commands ============= place bounty bounty beer gimme peace reset gimmehell gimme reset gimme gimme gimme off gimme on suicide santa gimme ragequit gimmehell --]]
function gmsg_fun() calledFunction = "gmsg_fun"
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "place" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "bounty") then pname = gmsgvars.words[3] id = LookupPlayer(pname)
bounty = math.abs(gmsgvars.words[4])
if players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash >= bounty then oldBounty = players[id].pvpBounty players[id].pvpBounty = players[id].pvpBounty + bounty players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash = players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash - bounty message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " has placed a bounty of " .. bounty .. " on " .. players[id].name .. "'s head![-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You now have " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash .. " zennies.[-]")
-- update the player's bounty conn:execute("UPDATE players SET pvpBounty = " .. players[id].pvpBounty .. " WHERE steam = " .. id)
-- reduce the cash of the player who placed the bounty conn:execute("UPDATE players SET cash = " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash .. " WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
if oldBounty > 0 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. "'s life is now worth " .. players[id].pvpBounty .. ".[-]") end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You do not have enough zennies to place that bounty.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "bounty") then id = gmsgvars.playerid
if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 9) id = LookupPlayer(pname) end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " has " .. players[id].pvpCount .. " kills. Kill them for " .. players[id].pvpBounty .. " zennies.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "haven" and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then if type(brchat) ~= "table" then brchat = {} end
table.insert(brchat, { os.time(), "BR-" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. ":" .. string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "haven") + 6) } )
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "waiter" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "beer" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then if inLocation(gmsgvars.intX, gmsgvars.intZ) == "library" then send("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " beer 1") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Enjoy your beer![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "peace") then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme has been silenced[-]") server.gimmePeace = true
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gimmePeace = 1")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "reset" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "gimmehell") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is for admins only[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.playername == "Server") then gimmeHell = 0 arenaPlayers = {} conn:execute("DELETE FROM playerQueue")
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]gimmeHell is ready to play[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
dist = distancexyz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].yPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, locations["arena"].x, locations["arena"].y, locations["arena"].z) if (dist < locations["arena"].size + 5) or (gmsgvars.playername == "Server") or (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then
gimmeHell = 0 arenaPlayers = {} conn:execute("DELETE FROM playerQueue")
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]gimmeHell is ready to play[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reset") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is for admins only[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
gimmeReset() disableTrigger("gimmeReset") enableTigger("gimmeReset")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "gimme") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme messages are now public[-]") server.gimmePeace = false
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gimmePeace = 0")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "off") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme has been disabled[-]") server.allowGimme = false
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowGimme = 0")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "on") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme has been enabled[-]") server.allowGimme = true
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowGimme = 1")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "suicide") then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].prisoner or players[gmsgvars.playerid].timeout == true or players[gmsgvars.playerid].botTimeout == true then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]BANG![-]") else if players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastSuicide ~= nil then if os.time() - players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastSuicide < 300 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]>CLICK!< Darn your gun jammed. Try again in a few minutes.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
send("kill " .. gmsgvars.playerid) players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastSuicide = os.time() end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "santa" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then if (not players[gmsgvars.playerid].santa) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]HO HO HO Merry Christmas! Press e now, don't let the Grinch steal Christmas.") send ("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " santaHat 1") send ("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " shades 1") send ("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " beer 1") send ("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " coalOre 1") send ("give " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " pipeBomb 1") players[gmsgvars.playerid].santa = "hohoho" else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have already received your stocking stuffer") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimmie" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimme") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if (server.allowGimme) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme is now triggered by casino coins in the last slot of your belt and runs every 30 seconds. Remove the coins to stop playing gimme.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
dist1 = distancexz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeX, players[gmsgvars.playerid].homeZ) dist2 = distancexz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2X, players[gmsgvars.playerid].home2Z)
if (dist1 < players[gmsgvars.playerid].protectSize) or (dist2 < players[gmsgvars.playerid].protect2Size) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Gimme will not spawn any zeds while you are inside your base protection.[-]") end
gimme(gmsgvars.playerid) else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Sorry, an admin has disabled gimme =([-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "quit") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then send("kick " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " RAAAAGE! xD") r = rand(3)
if r == 1 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " has left the building[-]") end
if r == 2 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " has left *SLAM!*[-]") end
if r == 3 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " " .. gmsgvars.words[1] .. "![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "quit") then msg = string.sub(line, string.find(line, "quit") + 5)
if msg ~= nil then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " quit with this parting shot.. " .. msg .."[-]") end
send("kick " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. "\"That'll learn em! xD\"")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "gimmehell" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then -- abort if not in arena
dist = distancexyz(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].yPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, locations["arena"].x, locations["arena"].y, locations["arena"].z)
if (tonumber(dist) > tonumber(locations["arena"].size)) and (tonumber(dist) < tonumber(locations["arena"].size) + 5) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Nobody is in the arena. You can't play from the spectator area. Get in the arena coward.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (tonumber(dist) > tonumber(locations["arena"].size)) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command can only be issued in the arena[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gimmeHell == 0) then gimmeHell = 1
-- send("sg MaxSpawnedZombies 50")
setupArenaPlayers(gmsgvars.playerid) tempTimer( 5, [[ announceGimmeHell("1") ]] ) tempTimer( 10, [[ queueGimmeHell("1") ]] ) tempTimer( 60, [[ announceGimmeHell("2") ]] ) tempTimer( 65, [[ queueGimmeHell("2") ]] ) tempTimer( 120, [[ announceGimmeHell("3") ]] ) tempTimer( 125, [[ queueGimmeHell("3") ]] ) tempTimer( 180, [[ announceGimmeHell("4") ]] ) tempTimer( 185, [[ queueGimmeHell("4") ]] ) faultGMSG = false return true else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Wait until the current gimmehell is concluded. You can reset it with /reset gimmehell[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
end

Script.name: gmsg_hotspots
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ hotspot commands ============= man hotspots resize hotspot move hotspot delete hotspots delete hotspot hotspot hotspots --]]
function removeInvalidHotspots(steam) local dist, size, delete
-- abort if staff member if accessLevel(steam) < 3 then return end
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where owner = " .. steam) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
while row do delete = true dist = distancexz(row.x, row.z, players[steam].homeX, players[steam].homeZ) size = tonumber(players[steam].protectSize)
if (dist < tonumber(size + 16)) then delete = false end
if math.abs(players[steam].home2X) > 0 and math.abs(players[steam].home2Z) > 0 then dist = distancexz(row.x, row.z, players[steam].home2X, players[steam].home2Z) size = tonumber(players[steam].protect2Size)
if (dist < tonumber(size + 16)) then delete = false end end
if delete then -- remove this hotspot hotspots[row.idx] = nil conn:execute("DELETE FROM hotspots WHERE idx = " .. row.idx) end
row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end end
function gmsg_hotspots() calledFunction = "gmsg_hotspots"
local idx, size, hotspotmsg, nextidx, debug
debug = false size = nil
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "man" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "hotspots") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hotspots are private messages triggered by proximity.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can set their size from 1 to 20 metres (default 2).[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]For command help type /help hotspots[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "resize" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "hotspot" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Change a hotspot's radius to a max of 10 (unlimited for admins).[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]eg. /resize hotspot 3 size 5[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Type /hotspots for a list of your hotspots[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
idx = tonumber(gmsgvars.words[3]) if idx == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Number required for hotspot.[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]eg. /resize hotspot 3 size 5[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Type /hotspots for a list of your hotspots[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[5] ~= nil then size = math.abs(tonumber(gmsgvars.words[5])) + 1
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then if size == nil or size == 1 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Number required for size greater than 0.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end else if size == nil or size > 11 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Number required for size in the range 1 to 10.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
size = math.floor(size) - 1 end end
hotspots[idx].size = size conn:execute("UPDATE hotspots SET size = " .. size .. " WHERE idx = " .. idx) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hotspot: " .. hotspots[idx].hotspot .. " now covers " .. size * 2 .. " metres[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 2") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "move" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "hotspot" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.number == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hotspot number required eg. /move hotspot 25.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2 then if not players[gmsgvars.playerid].atHome then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your hotspots may be no further than " .. tonumber(server.baseSize) + 15 .. " metres from your first or second bot protected base.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 4 then if hotspots[gmsgvars.number] then conn:execute("UPDATE hotspots SET x = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You moved the hotspot: " .. hotspots[gmsgvars.number].hotspot .. "[-]") hotspots[gmsgvars.number].x = gmsgvars.intX hotspots[gmsgvars.number].y = gmsgvars.intY hotspots[gmsgvars.number].z = gmsgvars.intZ
faultyGMSG = false return true else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no hotspot #" .. gmsgvars.number .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) rows = cursor:numrows()
if rows > 0 then row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") if row.owner ~= gmsgvars.playerid then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't own this hotspot.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else if hotspots[gmsgvars.number] then conn:execute("UPDATE hotspots SET x = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You moved the hotspot: " .. hotspots[gmsgvars.number].hotspot .. "[-]") hotspots[gmsgvars.number].x = gmsgvars.intX hotspots[gmsgvars.number].y = gmsgvars.intY hotspots[gmsgvars.number].z = gmsgvars.intZ
faultyGMSG = false return true else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no hotspot #" .. gmsgvars.number .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end end end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 3") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "delete" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "remove") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "hotspots" then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then pid = gmsgvars.playerid
if gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil then pid = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "hotspots ") + 10) pid = string.trim(pid) pid = LookupPlayer(pid)
if (pid == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player found with that name.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
conn:execute("DELETE FROM hotspots WHERE owner = " .. pid) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You deleted the hotspots belonging to " .. players[pid].name .. "[-]") -- reload the hotspots lua table loadHotspots() else conn:execute("DELETE FROM hotspots WHERE owner = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your hotspots have been deleted.[-]") -- reload the hotspots lua table loadHotspots() end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 4") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "delete" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "hotspot") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.number == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hotspot number required eg. /hotspot delete 25.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then if hotspots[gmsgvars.number] then conn:execute("DELETE FROM hotspots WHERE idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You deleted the hotspot: " .. hotspots[gmsgvars.number].hotspot .. "[-]") hotspots[gmsgvars.number] = nil else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no hotspot #" .. gmsgvars.number .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) rows = cursor:numrows()
if rows > 0 then row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") if row.owner ~= gmsgvars.playerid then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You don't own this hotspot.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else if hotspots[gmsgvars.number] then conn:execute("DELETE FROM hotspots WHERE idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You deleted the hotspot: " .. hotspots[gmsgvars.number].hotspot .. "[-]") hotspots[gmsgvars.number] = nil else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no hotspot #" .. gmsgvars.number .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 5") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "hotspot") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then faultyGMSG = help("hotspots") return true end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == nil and gmsgvars.number ~= nil then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then -- teleport the admin to the coords of the numbered hotspot cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where idx = " .. gmsgvars.number) rows = cursor:numrows()
if rows > 0 then row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
-- first record the players current position savePosition(gmsgvars.playerid)
cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y .. " " .. row.z prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd, true) else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no hotspot #" .. gmsgvars.number .. ".[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only admins can teleport to a hotspot.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.number == nil) then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2 and not players[gmsgvars.playerid].atHome then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You can only create hotspots in and around your base.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
hotspotmsg = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "hotspot ") + 8) hotspotmsg = string.trim(hotspotmsg)
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select max(idx) as max_idx from hotspots") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
if row.max_idx ~= nil then nextidx = tonumber(row.max_idx) + 1 else nextidx = 1 end
hotspots[nextidx] = {} hotspots[nextidx].hotspot = hotspotmsg hotspots[nextidx].owner = gmsgvars.playerid hotspots[nextidx].size = 2 hotspots[nextidx].x = gmsgvars.intX hotspots[nextidx].y = gmsgvars.intY hotspots[nextidx].z = gmsgvars.intZ
conn:execute("INSERT INTO hotspots (idx, hotspot, x, y, z, owner) VALUES (" .. nextidx .. ",'" .. escape(hotspotmsg) .. "'," .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. "," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ")")
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You made a hotspot with the message " .. hotspotmsg .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots 6") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "hotspots") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 99 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players are not allowed to play with hotspots.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.number == nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then if gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil then pid = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "hotspots ") + 10) pid = string.trim(pid) pid = LookupPlayer(pid) else gmsgvars.number = 20 end else pid = gmsgvars.playerid end
if (pid == nil and gmsgvars.number == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player found with that name.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (pid ~= nil) then cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where owner = " .. pid) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
while row do message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]#" .. row.idx .. " " .. row.hotspot .. "[-]") row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then gmsgvars.number = 20 cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where owner = " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " and abs(x - " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number .. " and abs(y - " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number .. " and abs(z - " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number) else if (gmsgvars.number == nil) then gmsgvars.number = 20 end cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from hotspots where abs(x - " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number .. " and abs(y - " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number .. " and abs(z - " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") <= " .. gmsgvars.number) end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The following hotspots are within " .. gmsgvars.number .. " metres of you[-]") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
while row do if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]#" .. row.idx .. " " .. players[row.owner].name .. " size " .. row.size * 2 .. "m " .. row.hotspot .. "[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]#" .. row.idx .. " size " .. row.size * 2 .. "m " .. row.hotspot .. "[-]") end
row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if debug then dbug("debug hotspots end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_info
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ info commands ============= uptime whats new where info help commands new players fps --]]
function gmsg_info() calledFunction = "gmsg_info"
local xdir, zdir, dist, x, z, diff, days, hours, minutes, result, tokens, time , werds, word, cmd
local debug debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if debug then dbug("debug info 1") end
result = false
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "uptime" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then diff = os.difftime(os.time(), botStarted) days = math.floor(diff / 86400)
if (days > 0) then diff = diff - (days * 86400) end
hours = math.floor(diff / 3600)
if (hours > 0) then diff = diff - (hours * 3600) end
minutes = math.floor(diff / 60)
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. server.botName .. " has been online " .. days .. " days " .. hours .. " hours " .. minutes .." minutes[-]")
if gameTick < 0 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Server uptime is unknown due to a server fault. Reboot the server.[-]") else diff = gameTick days = math.floor(diff / 86400)
if (days > 0) then diff = diff - (days * 86400) end
hours = math.floor(diff / 3600)
if (hours > 0) then diff = diff - (hours * 3600) end
minutes = math.floor(diff / 60)
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Server uptime is " .. days .. " days " .. hours .. " hours " .. minutes .." minutes[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug info 2") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "whats" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "new" then conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (0," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ",'" .. escape("[" .. server.chatColour .. "]This bot is being trialled here. Let us know if something doesn't work.[-]") .. "')") conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (0," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ",'" .. escape("[" .. server.chatColour .. "]Many boring changes such as a new database (EXCITING!)[-]") .. "')") conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (0," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ",'" .. escape("[" .. server.chatColour .. "]Teleporting has been altered yet again![-]") .. "')") conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (0," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ",'" .. escape("[" .. server.chatColour .. "]More boring changes designed to make the bot more stable and better at its many jobs.[-]") .. --[[ location commands ================= location clear location remove location pvp/pve location enable location disable location private location public lobby location owner location set reset location clear reset location allow base location disallow base location size location access location add protect location unprotect location location move locations location ends here location random location <name> --]]
function gmsg_locations() calledFunction = "gmsg_locations"
local debug, temp debug = false
local loc, locationName, locationName, id, pname
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 1") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "clear") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "clear") - 2) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if loc ~= nil then conn:execute("DELETE FROM locationSpawns WHERE location = '" .. escape(loc) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Location " .. locationName .. "'s teleports have been deleted.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "remove") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "remove ") + 7) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (locationName == "prison") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The server needs a prison. PVP protection will be disabled until you add a new prison.[-]") end
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc] = nil conn:execute("DELETE FROM locations WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You removed a location called " .. locationName .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 2") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pvp") or string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pve")) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " pv") - 1) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if loc ~= nil then if string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pve") then locations[loc].pvp = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set pvp = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locations[loc].name .. " is now a PVE zone.[-]") else locations[loc].pvp = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set pvp = true WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locations[loc].name .. " is now a PVP zone![-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 3") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "enable") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "enable ") + 7) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].active = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set active = true WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now enabled[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 4") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "disable") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "disable ") + 8) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].active = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set active = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now disabled[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 5") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "private") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "private ") + 8) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].public = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set public = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now private[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 6") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "public") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "public ") + 7) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].public = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set public = true WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now public[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "reset") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "reset ") + 6) locationName = string.trim(locationName)
loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].resetZone = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set resetZone = true WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now a reset zone[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "clear" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reset") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "reset ") + 7) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].resetZone = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set resetZone = false WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now a reset zone[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 7") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "lobby" and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "lobby ") + 6) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname)
if (id ~= nil) then -- if the player is ingame, send them to the lobby otherwise flag it to happen when they rejoin if (igplayers[id]) then cmd = "tele " .. id .. " " .. locations["spawnpoint1"].x .. " " .. locations["spawnpoint1"].y .. " " .. locations["spawnpoint1"].z teleport(cmd) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Player " .. players[id].name .. " has been sent to the lobby[-]") else players[id].lobby = true message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Player " .. players[id].name .. " will spawn in the lobby next time they connect to the server[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE players set location = 'lobby' WHERE steam = " .. id) end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 8") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "owner") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
id = LookupPlayer(gmsgvars.words[4]) if (players[id]) then pname = players[id].name else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player matched that name.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
loc = string.trim(gmsgvars.words[2]) loc = LookupLocation(loc)
if (loc ~= nil) then locations[loc].owner = id conn:execute("UPDATE locations set owner = " .. id .. " WHERE name = '" .. escape(loc) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " is the proud new owner of the location called " .. loc .. "[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 9") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "allow" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "base") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "base ") + 5) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") else locations[loc].allowBase = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations SET allowBase = true WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Players may setbase in " .. locationName .. ".[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 10") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "disallow" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "base") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "base ") + 5) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") else locations[loc].allowBase = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations SET allowBase = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Players may not setbase in " .. locationName .. ".[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 11") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "access") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "access") - 2) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil and loc ~= nil then locations[loc].accessLevel = math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) conn:execute("UPDATE locations set accessLevel = " .. math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) .. " WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locationName .. " is restricted to players with access level " .. locations[loc].accessLevel .. " and above.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 12") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "size") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "size") - 2) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil and loc ~= nil then locations[locationName].size = math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) conn:execute("UPDATE locations set size = " .. math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) .. ", protectSize = " .. math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) .. " WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locations[loc].name .. " now spans " .. tonumber(gmsgvars.number * 2) .. " meters.[-]")
if loc == "Prison" then server.prisonSize = math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number)) conn:execute("UPDATE server SET prisonSize = " .. math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number))) end end
if loc == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 13") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pvp") or string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pve")) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = "" locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " pv") - 1) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if loc ~= nil then if string.find(gmsgvars.command, "pve") then locations[loc].pvp = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set pvp = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locations[loc].name .. " is now a PVE zone.[-]") else locations[loc].pvp = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set pvp = true WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locations[loc].name .. " is now a PVP zone![-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 14") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "safe") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "safe ") + 5) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].killZombies = true conn:execute("UPDATE locations set killZombies = true WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is now a safezone.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 15") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "unsafe") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "unsafe ") + 7) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].killZombies = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations set killZombies = false WHERE name = '" .. escape(locationName) .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location called " .. locationName .. " is no longer a safezone![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 16") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "minigame") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = gmsgvars.words[2] loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else miniGame = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "minigame") + 9)
if (miniGame == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You didn't enter a minigame (eg. ctf, contest).[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
locations[loc].miniGame = miniGame conn:execute("UPDATE locations set miniGame = '" .. escape(miniGame) .. "' WHERE name = '" .. loc .. "'") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. locationName .. " is the mini-game " .. miniGame .. "![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug locations 17") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "location" and igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation ~= "") then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocationExit = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Walk out of " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation .. " and the bot will do the rest.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 18") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "unprotect" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "location" and igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation ~= "") then locations[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation].protected = false conn:execute("UPDATE locations SET protected = 0 WHERE name = '" .. escape(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation) .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have disabled protection for " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocation .. ".[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 19") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "add") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "add ") + 4) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc ~= nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location already exists.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[locationName] = {} locations[locationName].name = locationName locations[locationName].x = gmsgvars.intX locations[locationName].y = gmsgvars.intY locations[locationName].z = gmsgvars.intZ locations[locationName].active = true locations[locationName].public = false locations[locationName].owner = gmsgvars.playerid locations[locationName].size = 20
conn:execute("INSERT INTO locations (name, x, y, z) VALUES ('" .. escape(locationName) .. "'," .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE x = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ) conn:execute("INSERT INTO events (x, y, z, serverTime, type, event, steam) VALUES (" .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ",'" .. serverTime .. "','location added','Location " .. escape(locationName) .. " added'," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ")") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.playername .. " has created a location called " .. locationName .. "[-]") end
if (locationName == "prison") then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Server PVP protection is now enabled.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 20") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "move") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "move ") + 5) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else locations[loc].x = gmsgvars.intX locations[loc].y = gmsgvars.intY locations[loc].z = gmsgvars.intZ
conn:execute("INSERT INTO locations (name, x, y, z) VALUES ('" .. escape(locationName) .. "'," .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE x = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ) conn:execute("INSERT INTO events (x, y, z, serverTime, type, event, steam) VALUES (" .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ",'" .. serverTime .. "','location moved','Location " .. escape(locationName) .. " moved'," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. ")") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have moved a location called " .. locationName .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 21") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "locations" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then for k, v in pairs(locations) do if (v.public == true) then public = "public" else public = "private" end
if (public == "private" and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/" .. v.name .. " " .. public .. "[-]") end
if (public == "public") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 4) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/" .. v.name .. " " .. public .. "[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]/" .. v.name .. "[-]") end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 22") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "ends here") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "end") - 2) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if loc ~= nil then dist = distancexz(locations[loc].x, locations[loc].z, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos) locations[loc].size = string.format("%d", dist) conn:execute("UPDATE locations set size = " .. locations[loc].size .. ", protectSize = " .. locations[loc].size .. " WHERE name = '" .. locationName .. "'") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The location " .. loc .. " now spans " .. string.format("%d", dist * 2) .. " meters.[-]")
if loc == "Prison" then server.prisonSize = math.floor(tonumber(locations[loc].size)) conn:execute("UPDATE server SET prisonSize = " .. math.floor(tonumber(locations[loc].size))) end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 23") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "location" and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "random") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "random") - 2) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if loc ~= nil then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].location = loc message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are now creating spawn points for location " .. loc .. ". DO NOT FLY.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 24") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "location") then -- display details about the location
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
locationName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "location ") + 9) locationName = string.trim(locationName) loc = LookupLocation(locationName)
if (loc == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That location does not exist.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name = '" .. locationName .."'") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Location: " .. row.name .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Active: " .. dbYN(row.active) .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reset Zone: " .. dbYN(row.resetZone) .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Public: " .. dbYN(row.public) .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Allow Bases: " .. dbYN(row.allowBase) .. "[-]")
if row.miniGame ~= nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Mini Game: " .. row.miniGame .. "[-]") end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Village: " .. dbYN(row.village) .. "[-]")
temp = LookupPlayer(row.mayor) if row.owner ~= "0" then temp = LookupPlayer(row.mayor) else temp = "" end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Mayor: " .. temp .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Protected: " .. dbYN(row.protected) .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]PVP: " .. dbYN(row.pvp) .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Access Level: " .. row.accessLevel .. "[-]")
temp = LookupPlayer(row.owner) if row.owner ~= "0" then temp = LookupPlayer(row.owner) else temp = "" end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Owner: " .. temp .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Coords: " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y .. " " .. row.z .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Size: " .. row.size * 2 .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations 25") end
-- look for command in locations table loc = LookupLocation(gmsgvars.command)
if (loc ~= nil) then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].prisoner or not players[gmsgvars.playerid].canTeleport) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are not allowed to use teleports.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].walkies) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have not opted in to using teleports. Type /enabletp to opt-in.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name = '" .. escape(loc) .."'") row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
if (locations[loc].village == true) then if villagers[gmsgvars.playerid .. loc] then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown - os.time() > 0) and (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2 or server.ignoreAdmins == false) then -- and server.ignoreAdmins == false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have to wait " .. os.date("%M minutes %S seconds",players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown - os.time()) .. " before you can use /base again.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else players[gmsgvars.playerid].baseCooldown = (os.time() + 2400) -- 2400 = 40 minutes
players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld = 0 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation = loc
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from locationSpawns where location='" .. loc .. "'") if cursor:numrows() > 0 then randomPVPTP(gmsgvars.playerid, loc) else cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. locations[loc].x .. " " .. locations[loc].y .. " " .. locations[loc].z teleport(cmd) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
if (row.public == "0" and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and row.owner ~= gmsgvars.playerid then -- and not LookupVillager(gmsgvars.playerid, loc) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. row.name .. " is private[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (row.active == "0" and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. row.name .. " is not enabled right now[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > tonumber(row.accessLevel)) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are not authorised to visit " .. row.name .. ".[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if tonumber(row.cost) > 0 then if row.currency == "zennies" then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash < tonumber(row.cost) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You do not have enough zennies to travel there.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else -- collect payment players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash = players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash - tonumber(row.cost) end else if not inInventory(gmsgvars.playerid, row.currency, row.cost) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You do not have enough of the required item to travel there.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation ~= loc and tonumber(gmsgvars.intY) > -1 then savePosition(gmsgvars.playerid) igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation = loc end
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from locationSpawns where location='" .. escape(loc) .. "'") if cursor:numrows() > 0 then randomPVPTP(gmsgvars.playerid, loc) else cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y .. " " .. row.z prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug locations end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_resets
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ reset zones commands ==================== reset zones add reset zone delete reset zone --]]
function gmsg_resets() calledFunction = "gmsg_resets"
local region, x, z, debug
debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug resets 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "add" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "remove" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "delete") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reset" and (gmsgvars.words[3] == "region" or gmsgvars.words[3] == "zone") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
x = math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos / 512) z = math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos / 512) region = "r." .. x .. "." .. z .. ".7rg"
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "add") then resetRegions[region] = {} conn:execute("INSERT INTO resetZones (region) VALUES ('" .. region .. "')") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Region " .. region .. " is now a reset zone.[-]") else resetRegions[region] = nil conn:execute("DELETE FROM resetZones WHERE region = '" .. region .. "')") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Region " .. region .. " is no longer a reset zone.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug resets 2") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "reset" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "zones" then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("select * from resetZones") if cursor:numrows() == 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No regions have been flagged as reset zones.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The following regions are reset zones:[-]")
row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. row.region .. "[-]") row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug resets end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_server
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ server commands =============== wait translate on translate off reboot set prison size set map size set base cooldown motd set motd reset server (wipes all info from bot and collects info from server) reset bot (wipes most info but retains player data) cancel reboot pause reboot unpause reboot enable/disable reboot set chat colour say<fr><es><de> etc eg sayfr restore backup set website set irc server set irc main/alerts/watch set/clear max ping set/clear welcome message max zombies max animals max players set server pvp/pve/creative/contest --]]
function gmsg_server() calledFunction = "gmsg_server"
local debug, tmp
debug = false
if debug then dbug("debug server 0") end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "wait") and scheduledRestartForced == false and (server.scheduledRestartTimestamp - os.time() < 61)) then scheduledRestartForced = true
if rebootTimerID ~= nil and rebootTimerDelayID == nil then disableTimer(rebootTimerID) rebootTimerDelayID = tempTimer( 60, [[enableTimer(]] .. rebootTimerID .. [[)]] ) message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The scheduled reboot has been delayed for 2 minutes. Clear all forges, campfires and stop crafting![-]") rebootTimer = rebootTimer + 120 end
if server.scheduledRestart == true then server.scheduledRestartTimestamp = server.scheduledRestartTimestamp + 120 message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The scheduled reboot has been delayed for 2 minutes. Clear all forges, campfires and stop crafting![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if debug then dbug("debug server 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "translate" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "on" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " on ") + 5) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) if not (id == nil) then players[id].translate = true message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Chat from player " .. players[id].name .. " will be translated to English.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET translate = 1 WHERE steam = " .. id) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 2") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "translate" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "off" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, " off ") + 6) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) if not (id == nil) then players[id].translate = false message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Chat from player " .. players[id].name .. " will no longer be translated.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET translate = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id) end faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 3") end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "say") and (string.len(gmsgvars.words[1]) == 5) and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then msg = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.len(gmsgvars.words[1]) + 2) msg = string.trim(msg)
if (msg ~= "") then Translate(gmsgvars.playerid, msg, string.sub(gmsgvars.words[1], 4), true) end faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- ################### Staff only beyond this point ################ -- Don't proceed if this is a player. Server and staff only here. if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return false end end -- ##################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug server 4") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "restore" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "backup") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
importLuaData()
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 5") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "irc" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "server") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tmp = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "server") + 7) tmp = string.trim(tmp)
if tmp == nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server name is required.[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server name is required.[-]") end else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]We have an irc server at " .. tmp .. ". See you there! :3[-]") server.ircServer = tmp conn:execute("UPDATE server SET ircServer = '" .. escape(tmp) .. "'") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 6") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "irc") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
pname = gmsgvars.words[4]
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "main" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The main irc channel is now " .. pname .. ", alerts is " .. pname .. "_alerts" .. ", and watch is " .. pname .. "_watch" .. ".[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The main irc channel is now " .. pname .. ", alerts is " .. pname .. "_alerts" .. ", and watch is " .. pname .. "_watch" .. ".[-]") end
server.ircMain = "#" .. pname server.ircAlerts = "#" .. pname .. "_alerts" server.ircWatch = "#" .. pname .. "_watch" end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "alerts" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The alerts irc channel is now " .. pname .. ".[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The alerts irc channel is now " .. pname .. ".[-]") end
server.ircAlerts = "#" .. pname end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "watch" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The watch irc channel is now " .. pname .. ".[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The watch irc channel is now " .. pname .. ".[-]") end
server.ircWatch = "#" .. pname end
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET ircMain = '" .. server.ircMain .. "', ircAlerts = '" .. server.ircAlerts .. "', ircWatch = '" .. server.ircWatch .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 7") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "reboot") then if server.allowReboot == false then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is disabled for this server. Reboot manually.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (server.scheduledRestart == true) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A reboot is already scheduled. Cancel it first.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
restartDelay = string.match(gmsgvars.command, "%d+") if (restartDelay == nil) then restartDelay = 120 message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server reboot is happening in 2 minutes.[-]") end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 2) then if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "forced")) then scheduledRestartForced = true end end end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "minute")) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server reboot is happening in " .. restartDelay .. " minutes.[-]") restartDelay = restartDelay * 60 end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "hour")) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server reboot is happening in " .. restartDelay .. " hours time.[-]") restartDelay = restartDelay * 60 * 60 end
scheduledRestartPaused = false server.scheduledRestart = true server.scheduledRestartTimestamp = os.time() + restartDelay faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 8") end
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "prison" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "size") then if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then server.prisonSize = math.floor(tonumber(gmsgvars.number) / 2)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The prison is now " .. tonumber(gmsgvars.number) .. " meters wide.[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The prison is now " .. tonumber(gmsgvars.number) .. " meters wide.[-]") end
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET prisonSize = " .. gmsgvars.number) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 9") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "map" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "size") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then server.mapSize = gmsgvars.number message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Players are now restricted to " .. gmsgvars.number .. " meters from 0,0[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET mapSize = " .. gmsgvars.number) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 10") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "base" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "cooldown") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then server.baseCooldown = gmsgvars.number message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Players must wait " .. gmsgvars.number .. " minutes after using /base before it becomes available again.[-]") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Donors must wait " .. math.floor(gmsgvars.number / 2) .. " minutes.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET baseCooldown = " .. gmsgvars.number) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 11") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "motd") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if server.MOTD == nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no MOTD currently.[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no MOTD currently.[-]") end else if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. server.MOTD .. "[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. server.MOTD .. "[-]") end end else server.MOTD = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, "motd") + 5) message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New message of the day recorded.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET MOTD = '" .. escape(server.MOTD) .. "'") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 12") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "cancel" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reboot" and gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is for admins only[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (scheduledRestartForced == true) and (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A forced reboot is scheduled and will proceed as planned.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
scheduledReboot = false server.scheduledIdleRestart = false server.scheduledRestart = false server.scheduledRestartTimestamp = os.time() scheduledRestartPaused = nil scheduledRestartForced = nil
if (rebootTimerID ~= nil) then killTimer(rebootTimerID) end if (rebootTimerDelayID ~= nil) then killTimer(rebootTimerDelayID) end
rebootTimerID = nil rebootTimerDelayID = nil
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A server reboot has been cancelled.[-]") tempTimer( 2, [[message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]OH! I guess we're not rebooting after all.[-]")]] )
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 13") end
