if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "pause" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reboot" and gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) then if server.scheduledRestart == true and scheduledRestartPaused == false then scheduledRestartPaused = true restartTimeRemaining = server.scheduledRestartTimestamp - os.time() message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The reboot has been paused.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 14") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "unpause" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reboot" and gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) then if scheduledRestartPaused == true then server.scheduledRestartTimestamp = os.time() + restartTimeRemaining scheduledRestartPaused = false rebootTimer = restartTimeRemaining message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The reboot countdown has resumed.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 15") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "enable" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "disable") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "reboot" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "enable" then server.allowReboot = true message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The bot will automatically reboot the server as needed.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowReboot = true") else server.allowReboot = false message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The bot will not reboot the server.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowReboot = false") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 16") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "name" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "bot" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tmp = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, gmsgvars.words[2]) + 4, string.len(gmsgvars.oldLine)) if tmp == "Tester" and gmsgvars.playerid ~= Smegz0r then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]That name is reserved.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
server.botName = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, gmsgvars.words[2]) + 4, string.len(gmsgvars.oldLine)) message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The bot shall henceforth be known as " .. server.botName .. ".[-]")
msg = "say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hello I am the server bot, " .. server.botName .. ". Pleased to meet you. :3[-]" tempTimer( 5, [[message(msg)]] )
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET botName = '" .. escape(server.botName) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 17") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "chat" and (gmsgvars.words[3] == "colour" or gmsgvars.words[3] == "color")) then server.chatColour = gmsgvars.words[4] message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have changed the bot's chat colour.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE server SET chatColour = '" .. escape(server.chatColour) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 18") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "website") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tmp = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "website") + 8) tmp = string.trim(tmp)
if tmp == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A website or group is required.[-]") else message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Our website/group is " .. tmp .. ". Check us out! :3[-]") server.website = tmp conn:execute("UPDATE server SET website = '" .. escape(tmp) .. "'") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 19") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "server" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "ip") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tmp = gmsgvars.words[4]
if tmp == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The server ip is required.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The server ip is " .. tmp .. ".[-]") server.IP = tmp conn:execute("UPDATE server SET IP = '" .. escape(tmp) .. "'") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 20") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "clear") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "max" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "ping" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "clear" then server.pingKick = -1 message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Ping kicking is disabled.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET pingKick = -1")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then if tonumber(gmsgvars.number) > -1 and tonumber(gmsgvars.number) < 100 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.number .. " is quite low. Enter a number > 99[-]") else server.pingKick = gmsgvars.number message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New players with a ping above " .. gmsgvars.number .. " will be kicked from the server.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET pingKick = " .. gmsgvars.number) end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 21") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "clear") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "welcome" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "message" then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "clear" then server.welcome = nil message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Server welcome message cleared.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET welcome = null")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
msg = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, "message") + 8) msg = string.trim(msg)
server.welcome = msg message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]New welcome message " .. msg .. "[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET welcome = '" .. escape(msg) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 22") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "server") and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "pvp" then server.gameType = "pvp" message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This server is now PVP.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gameType = 'pvp'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "pve" then server.gameType = "pve" message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This server is now PVE.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gameType = 'pve'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "creative" then server.gameType = "cre" message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This server is now creative.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gameType = 'cre'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[3] == "contest" then server.gameType = "con" message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This server is now in contest mode.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE server SET gameType = 'con'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
end
if debug then dbug("debug server 23") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "disallow" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "bad" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "names") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The bot will kick players with names that have no letters.[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "The bot will kick players with names that have no letters.") end
server.allowNumericNames = false server.allowGarbageNames = false conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowNumericNames = 0, allowGarbageNames = 0")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 24") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "allow" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "bad" and gmsgvars.words[3] == "names") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Players can call themselves anything they like.[-]") else irc_QueueMsg(server.ircMain, "]Players can call themselves anything they like.") end
server.allowNumericNames = true server.allowGarbageNames = true conn:execute("UPDATE server SET allowNumericNames = 1, allowGarbageNames = 1")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 25") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "reset") and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "server") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Are you sure you want to wipe the bot completely clean? Answer yes to proceed or anything else to cancel.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion = "reset server"
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 26") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "reset") and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "bot") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Are you sure you want to reset the bot? Answer yes to proceed or anything else to cancel.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion = "reset bot"
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 27") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "no") and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "reset") then if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Oh ok then.[-]") server.warnBotReset = false
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 28") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "max" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "zeds" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "zombies") and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then gmsgvars.number = math.abs(math.floor(gmsgvars.number))
if gmsgvars.number > 150 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.number .. " is too high. Set a lower limit.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
send("sg MaxSpawnedZombies " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Max spawned zombies is now " .. gmsgvars.number .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 29") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "max" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "players" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then gmsgvars.number = math.abs(math.floor(gmsgvars.number))
send("sg ServerMaxPlayerCount " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Max players is now " .. gmsgvars.number .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server 30") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "max" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "animals" and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then gmsgvars.number = math.abs(math.floor(gmsgvars.number))
if gmsgvars.number > 150 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.number .. " is too high. Set a lower limit.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
send("sg MaxSpawnedAnimals " .. gmsgvars.number) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Max spawned animals is now " .. gmsgvars.number .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug server end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_shop
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ shop commands ============= shop buy cash pay zennies bank gamble wallet lottery show cash hide cash --]]
function gmsg_shop() calledFunction = "gmsg_shop"
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "shop"or gmsgvars.words[1] == "buy") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and (server.allowShop == false) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The shop is closed until further notice.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
faultyGMSG = doShop(gmsgvars.command, gmsgvars.playerid, gmsgvars.words) return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "cash" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "pay" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "zennies" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "bank" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "gamble" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "wallet") then faultyGMSG = doShop(gmsgvars.command, gmsgvars.playerid, gmsgvars.words) return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "zcoins" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "zgate") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No zgates or zcoins here. We are using our own server bot :3[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "lottery" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "lotto" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "tickets") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The lottery prize pool has reached " .. server.lottery .. " zennies![-]") cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT count(ticket) as tickets FROM lottery WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a")
if tonumber(row.tickets) > 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have " .. row.tickets .. " tickets in the next draw![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "show" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "cash") then players[gmsgvars.playerid].watchCash = true message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You will see your zennies increase with each zombie kill.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE players SET watchCash = 1 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "hide" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "cash") then players[gmsgvars.playerid].watchCash = nil message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your zennies will not be reported with each zombie kill.[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE players SET watchCash = 0 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
end

Script.name: gmsg_teleports
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ teleport commands ============= killtp privatetp publictp activatetp deactivatetp onetp twotp enabletp disabletp fetch pack stuck return teleports opentp closetp --]]
function gmsg_teleports() calledFunction = "gmsg_teleports"
local debug
debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 1\n") end if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "killtp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = "" tpname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "killtp ") + 7) tpname = string.trim(tpname)
if (tpname == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
teleports[tp] = nil end
conn:execute("DELETE FROM teleports WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have deleted a teleport called " .. tpname .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 2\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "privatetp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = "" tpname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "privatetp ") + 10) tpname = string.trim(tpname)
if (tpname == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
teleports[tp].public = false end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You changed a teleport called " .. tpname .. " to private[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET public = 0 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 3\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "publictp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = "" tpname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "publictp ") + 9) tpname = string.trim(tpname)
if (tpname == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
teleports[tp].public = true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You changed a teleport called " .. tpname .. " to public[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET public = 1 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 4\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "activatetp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = "" tpname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "activatetp ") + 11) tpname = string.trim(tpname)
if (tpname == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
teleports[tp].active = true end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You enabled a teleport called " .. tpname .. "[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET active = 1 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 5\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "deactivatetp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (not admins[gmsgvars.playerid]) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is for admins only[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = "" tpname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "deactivatetp ") + 13) tpname = string.trim(tpname)
if (tpname == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
teleports[tp].active = false end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You disabled a teleport called " .. tpname .. "[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET active = 0 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 6\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "onetp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = string.trim(gmsgvars.words[2])
tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
if (tp ~= "") then teleports[tp].oneway = true message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. teleports[tp].name .. " is a one way teleport.[-]") end
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET oneway = 1 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 7\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "twotp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
tpname = string.trim(gmsgvars.words[2])
tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(tpname)
if (tp ~= "") then teleports[tp].oneway = false message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. teleports[tp].name .. " is a two way teleport.[-]") end
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET oneway = 0 WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 8\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "owntp") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
id = LookupPlayer(gmsgvars.words[3]) if (players[id]) then pname = players[id].name end
tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(gmsgvars.words[2])
if (tp ~= "") then teleports[tp].owner = id message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " is the proud new owner of a teleport called " .. teleports[tp].name .. "[-]") end
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET owner = " .. id .. " WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 9\n") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "enabletp") then id = gmsgvars.playerid pname = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name
if (admins[gmsgvars.playerid] and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then id = LookupPlayer(string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "enabletp") + 9)) if (id == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No matching player found.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else players[id].walkies = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Player " .. players[id].name .. " can now use teleports[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET walkies = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
players[id].walkies = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]you can use teleports and admins can teleport you[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE players SET walkies = 0 WHERE steam = " .. id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 10\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "disabletp") then id = gmsgvars.playerid pname = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].name
players[id].walkies = true
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]you cannot use teleports and admins can't teleport you (some exceptions)[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE players SET walkies = 1 WHERE steam = " .. id)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 10A\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "fetch") then if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "fetch") then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "fetch ") + 6) end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and players[gmsgvars.playerid].tokens <= 0 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A P2P Token is required. Purchase one from the shop in soyspecials.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname)
if id == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player found matching " .. pname .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if not igplayers[id] then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Player " .. players[id].name .. " is not playing right now.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(id) < 3) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Staff cannot be fetched.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then -- reject if not a friend if (not isFriend(id, gmsgvars.playerid)) and (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and (id ~= gmsgvars.playerid) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only friends of " .. players[id].name .. " and staff can do this.")
faultyGMSG = false result = true return end end
if players[id].xPosOld == nil then -- first record their current x y z savePosition(id) end
-- then teleport the player to you cmd = "tele " .. id .. " " .. gmsgvars.intX + 1 .. " " .. gmsgvars.intY .. " " .. gmsgvars.intZ prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd, true)
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then players[gmsgvars.playerid].tokens = players[gmsgvars.playerid].tokens - 1 end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " is being teleported to your location now.") message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are being teleported to " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. "'s location.")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 11\n") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "pack" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].deathX ~= 0 then if players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastCommand ~= gmsgvars.command then if tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash) < 50 then if tonumber(igplayers[steam].sessionPlaytime) + tonumber(players[steam].timeOnServer) > 3600 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command costs 50 zennies. Start saving and don't die.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end end
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT x, y, z FROM tracker WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " and ((abs(x - " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].deathX .. ") > 5 and abs(x - " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].deathX .. ") < 50) and (abs(z - " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].deathZ .. ") > 5 and abs(z - " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].deathZ .. ") < 50)) ORDER BY trackerid DESC Limit 0, 1") if cursor:numrows() > 0 then row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") cmd = ("tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y .. " " .. row.z)
-- first record their current x y z savePosition(gmsgvars.playerid)
prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd, true)
if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastCommand ~= gmsgvars.command then if tonumber(igplayers[steam].sessionPlaytime) + tonumber(players[steam].timeOnServer) > 3600 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]50 zennies have been deducted from your cash. You now have " .. tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash) - 100 .. " zennies.[-]") players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash = tonumber(players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash) - 50 end end else if tonumber(igplayers[steam].sessionPlaytime) + tonumber(players[steam].timeOnServer) > 3600 then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Sorry I am unable to find a spot close to your pack to send you there. No charge.[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Sorry I am unable to find a spot close to your pack to send you there.[-]") end end
end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "stuck" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then if (tonumber(gmsgvars.intY) > 0 and tonumber(gmsgvars.intY) < 256) and (players[gmsgvars.playerid].lastCommand ~= gmsgvars.command) then -- bump the players position up 1 meter y + 1 send("tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos) .. " " .. math.ceil(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].yPos) + 1 .. " " .. math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos)) else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT x, y, z FROM tracker WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " AND ((abs(x - " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ") > 2 and abs(x - " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ") < 30) and (abs(z - " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") > 2 and abs(z - " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") < 30)) ORDER BY trackerid DESC Limit 0, 1") if cursor:numrows() > 0 then row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") send("tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. row.x .. " " .. row.y + 1 .. " " .. row.z) else -- bump the players position up 1 meter y + 1 send("tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos) .. " " .. math.ceil(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].yPos) + 1 .. " " .. math.floor(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos)) end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 12\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "return") and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil then -- return to previously recorded x y z if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld ~= 0) then
cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd)
if players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPos < 1000 then players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld = 0 players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld = 0 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].lastLocation = "" end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have already used your return.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 13\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "teleports" and gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
id = nil if (gmsgvars.words[2]) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "teleports ") + 10) pname = string.trim(pname) if (pname ~= nil) then id = LookupPlayer(pname) end end
for k, v in pairs(teleports) do if (v.public == true) then public = "public" else public = "private" end
if (id == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. v.name .. " " .. public .. "[-]") else if (v.owner == id) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. v.name .. " " .. public .. "[-]") end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 14\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "tp") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
teleName = "" teleName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "tp ") + 3) teleName = string.trim(teleName)
if (teleName == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the /tp command[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(teleName)
-- first record their current x y z savePosition(gmsgvars.playerid)
cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. math.floor(teleports[tp].x) .. " " .. math.ceil(teleports[tp].y) .. " " .. math.floor(teleports[tp].z) prepareTeleport(gmsgvars.playerid, cmd) teleport(cmd, true) end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 15\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "opentp") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
teleName = "" teleName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "opentp ") + 7) teleName = string.trim(teleName)
if (teleName == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playername .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(teleName) action = "moved"
if (tp == nil) then teleports[teleName] = {} action = "created" teleports[teleName].public = false teleports[teleName].active = false teleports[teleName].friends = false teleports[teleName].name = teleName teleports[teleName].owner = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].steam teleports[teleName].oneway = false end
teleports[teleName].x = gmsgvars.intX teleports[teleName].y = gmsgvars.intY teleports[teleName].z = gmsgvars.intZ end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have " .. action .. " a teleport called " .. teleName .. "[-]")
conn:execute("INSERT INTO teleports (name, owner, x, y, z) VALUES ('" .. teleName .. "'," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. "," .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ") ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE x = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " ..gmsgvars.intZ)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports 16\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "closetp") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
teleName = "" teleName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "closetp ") + 8) teleName = string.trim(teleName)
if (teleName == "") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A name is required for the teleport[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true else tp = "" tp = LookupTeleportByName(teleName)
if (teleports[tp].owner == igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].steam) and (teleports[tp].name == teleName) then teleports[tp].dx = gmsgvars.intX teleports[tp].dy = gmsgvars.intY teleports[tp].dz = gmsgvars.intZ
if (teleports[tp].x ~= nil) then teleports[tp].active = true end end end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have activated a teleport called " .. teleName .. "[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE teleports SET dx = " .. teleports[tp].dx .. ", dy = " .. teleports[tp].dy .. ", dz = " .. teleports[tp].dz .. " WHERE name = '" .. escape(tp) .. "'")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug teleports end\n") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_villages
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ village commands ================ /elect /add member /remove member /add village /remove village /village size /villagers /protect village --]]
function gmsg_villages() calledFunction = "gmsg_villages"
local debug
debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
if debug then display ("debug villages 1\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "elect" and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village")) then name1 = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "elect") + 6, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") - 1) name1 = string.trim(name1) pid = LookupPlayer(name1)
villageName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") + 8) villageName = string.trim(villageName)
vid = LookupLocation(villageName) if vid == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no village called " .. villageName .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (pid ~= nil) then if locations[villageName] ~= nil then locations[villageName].mayor = pid message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Congratulations " .. players[pid].name .. " on becoming the new mayor of " .. villageName .. "[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE locations SET mayor = " .. pid .. " WHERE name = '" .. escape(villageName) .. "'") conn:execute("INSERT INTO villagers SET steam = " .. pid .. ", village = '" .. escape(villageName) .. "'")
villagers[pid .. vid] = {} villagers[pid .. vid].village = villageName end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 2\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "add" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "member") then if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village")) then name1 = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "member") + 7, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") - 1) name1 = string.trim(name1)
pid = LookupPlayer(name1)
villageName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") + 8) villageName = string.trim(villageName)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and (locations[villageName].mayor ~= gmsgvars.playerid) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
vid = LookupLocation(villageName) if vid == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no village called " .. villageName .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if locations[vid].village ~= true then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. villageName .. " is not a village.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (pid ~= nil) then conn:execute("INSERT INTO villagers SET steam = " .. pid .. ", village = '" .. escape(villageName) .. "'")
villagers[pid .. vid] = {} villagers[pid .. vid].village = villageName
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[pid].name .. " is now a member of " .. villageName .. " village.[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 3\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "remove" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "village") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
villageName = string.trim(string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village ") + 8))
vid = LookupLocation(villageName) if vid == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no village called " .. villageName .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
locations[vid] = nil
conn:execute("DELETE FROM villagers WHERE village = '" .. escape(vid) .. "'") conn:execute("DELETE FROM locations WHERE name = '" .. escape(vid) .. "'")
for k, v in pairs(villagers) do if (v.villageName == vid) then k = nil end end
message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.playername .. " has removed a village portal called " .. vid .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 4\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "village") then if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
villageName = string.trim(string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village ") + 8, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "size") - 1))
vid = LookupLocation(villageName) if vid == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no village called " .. villageName .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
baseprotection = tonumber(string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "size ") + 5)) if (baseprotection == nil) then baseprotection = 50 end
if (locations[vid]) then locations[vid].size = baseprotection locations[vid].protect = false message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.playername .. " has set village protection to " .. baseprotection .. " meters for village " .. vid .. "[-]") conn:execute("UPDATE locations SET size = " .. baseprotection .. ", protect=0 WHERE name = '" .. escape(vid) .. "'") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 5\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "remove" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "member") then if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village")) then name1 = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "member") + 7, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") - 1) name1 = string.trim(name1) pid = LookupPlayer(name1)
villageName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village") + 8) villageName = string.trim(villageName)
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) and (locations[villageName].mayor ~= gmsgvars.playerid) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end end
vid = LookupLocation(villageName) if vid == nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]There is no village called " .. villageName .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (pid ~= nil) then conn:execute("DELETE FROM villagers WHERE village = '" .. escape(vid) .. "' and steam = " .. pid) villagers[pid .. vid] = nil message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[pid].name .. " has been cast out of village " .. vid .. "[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 6\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "villages" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]List of villages:[-]")
for k, v in pairs(locations) do if (v.village == true) then pid = nil
if v.mayor ~= nil then pid = LookupOfflinePlayer(v.mayor) end
if pid ~= nil then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. v.name .. " the Mayor is " .. players[pid].name .. "[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. v.name .. "[-]") end end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "villagers") then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]List of villagers:[-]")
villageName = nil if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then villageName = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "villagers ") + 10) end
if villageName ~= nil then villageName = string.trim(villageName) cursor1,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name = '" .. escape(villageName) .."' and village = 1") else cursor1,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM locations WHERE village = 1") end
row1 = cursor1:fetch({}, "a") while row1 do message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The village of " .. row1.name .. "[-]")
cursor2,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM villagers WHERE village = '" .. escape(row1.name) .."'") row2 = cursor2:fetch({}, "a") while row2 do if row1.mayor == row2.steam then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[row2.steam].name .. " (The Mayor)[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[row2.steam].name .. "[-]") end row2 = cursor2:fetch(row2, "a") end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "][-]")
row1 = cursor1:fetch(row1, "a") end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "][-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 7\n") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "add" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "village") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
villageName = string.trim(string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "village ") + 8))
if not locations[villageName] then locations[villageName] = {} locations[villageName].name = villageName locations[villageName].owner = gmsgvars.playerid locations[villageName].x = gmsgvars.intX locations[villageName].y = gmsgvars.intY locations[villageName].z = gmsgvars.intZ locations[villageName].size = server.baseSize locations[villageName].active = true locations[villageName].public = false locations[villageName].village = true locations[villageName].mayor = 0 message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.playername .. " has created a village portal called " .. villageName .. "[-]") message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. villageName .. " needs villagers and a mayor.[-]")
conn:execute("INSERT INTO locations (name, owner, x, y, z, village, size) VALUES ('" .. escape(villageName) .. "'," .. gmsgvars.playerid .. "," .. gmsgvars.intX .. "," .. gmsgvars.intY .. "," .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ",1," .. server.baseSize .. ") ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE x = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", y = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", z = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. ", village=1, size=" .. server.baseSize) else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. villageName .. " already exists.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages 8\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "protect" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "village") and gmsgvars.words[3] ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, "village") + 8) pname = string.trim(pname) else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You need to tell me the name of the village you are protecting.[-]") end
dist = distance(igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].xPos, igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].zPos, locations[pname].x, locations[pname].z)
if (dist < tonumber(locations[pname].size) + 1) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You are too close to the village, but just walk away and I will set it when you are far enough.[-]") igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].alertLocationExit = pname faultyGMSG = false return true end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug villages end\n") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_waypoints
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ waypoint commands ================= open waypoint close waypoint set waypoint clear waypoint waypoints --]]
function gmsg_waypoints() calledFunction = "gmsg_waypoints"
local debug
debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 1\n") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "open" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "waypoint" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "wp") then if(accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have waypoints.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- set the players waypoint coords players[gmsgvars.playerid].shareWaypoint = true message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your friends can now teleport to your waypoint by typing just " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " or part of it.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET shareWaypoint = 1 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 2\n") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "close" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "waypoint" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "wp") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have waypoints.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- set the players waypoint coords players[gmsgvars.playerid].shareWaypoint = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only you can teleport to your waypoint.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET shareWaypoint = 0 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 3\n") end
if gmsgvars.words[1] == "set" and (gmsgvars.words[2] == "waypoint" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "wp") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have waypoints.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- set the players waypoint coords players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointX = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointY = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointZ = gmsgvars.intZ message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You have set a waypoint. You can tp to it with /waypoint.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET waypointX = " .. gmsgvars.intX .. ", waypointY = " .. gmsgvars.intY .. ", waypointZ = " .. gmsgvars.intZ .. " WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 4\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "clear" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "delete" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "kill") and gmsgvars.words[2] == "waypoint" then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have waypoints.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- set the players waypoint coords players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointX = nil players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointY = nil players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointZ = nil players[gmsgvars.playerid].shareWaypoint = false message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Your waypoint has been cleared.[-]")
conn:execute("UPDATE players SET waypointX = 0, waypointY = 0, waypointZ = 0 WHERE steam = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 5\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "waypoint" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "wp" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 10) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Only donors and admins can have waypoints.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
-- store the current coords players[gmsgvars.playerid].xPosOld = gmsgvars.intX players[gmsgvars.playerid].yPosOld = gmsgvars.intY players[gmsgvars.playerid].zPosOld = gmsgvars.intZ
-- tp the player to their waypointwaypoint cmd = "tele " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointX .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointY .. " " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].waypointZ teleport(cmd, true)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints 6\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "waypoints") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if (gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]A player name or id is required.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
id = nil if (gmsgvars.words[2]) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "waypoints ") + 10) pname = string.trim(pname) if (pname ~= nil) then id = LookupPlayer(pname) end
if (id ~= nil) then if (players[id].waypointX) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " " .. players[id].waypointX .. " " .. players[id].waypointY .. " " .. players[id].waypointZ .. "[-]") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " Doesn't have a waypoint set.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true else faultyGMSG = false return true end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug waypoints end\n") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_unslashed
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ unslashed commands =============
--]]
function gmsg_unslashed() calledFunction = "gmsg_unslashed"
local debug
debug = false
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
-- ################### do not allow the bot to respond to itself ################ if string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/" and gmsgvars.playername == "Server" then faultyGMSG = false return true end -- ####################################################################################
-- ################# do not proceed if the line starts with a slash ################# if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) == "/") then -- line starts with a slash so stop processing it. faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 0") end
if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion == "pay player" then if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "yes")) then if (players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash >= igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue) or accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 0 then players[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID].cash = players[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID].cash + igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue
if accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 0 then players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash = players[gmsgvars.playerid].cash - igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue .. " has been paid to " .. players[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID].name .. "[-]")
if (igplayers[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID]) then message("pm " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Payday! " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. " has paid you " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue .. " zennies![-]") end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I regret to inform you that you do not have sufficient funds to pay " .. players[igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID].name .. "[-]") end end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion = "" igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue = nil faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 1") end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion == "reset server" and gmsgvars.words[1] == "yes" and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 0 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Deleting all bot data and restarting it..[-]") ResetServer()
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion = "" igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue = nil faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion == "reset bot" and gmsgvars.words[1] == "yes" and accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) == 0 then ResetBot() message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The bot has been reset. All bases, inventories etc are forgotten, but not the players.[-]")
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestion = "" igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionID = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].botQuestionValue = nil faultyGMSG = false return true end end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "build") and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "reset")) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Reset zones are deleted and regenerate with random POIs and prefabs. Anything you build there will be lost. Resets are done manually.[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 2") end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "wait") and scheduledRestartForced == false and (server.scheduledRestartTimestamp - os.time() < 61)) then scheduledRestartForced = true
if rebootTimerID ~= nil and rebootTimerDelayID == nil then disableTimer(rebootTimerID) rebootTimerDelayID = tempTimer( 60, [[enableTimer(]] .. rebootTimerID .. [[)]] ) message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The scheduled reboot has been delayed for 2 minutes. Clear all forges, campfires and stop crafting![-]") rebootTimer = rebootTimer + 120 end
if server.scheduledRestart == true then server.scheduledRestartTimestamp = server.scheduledRestartTimestamp + 120 message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]The scheduled reboot has been delayed for 2 minutes. Clear all forges, campfires and stop crafting![-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 3") end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "when") and string.find(gmsgvars.command, "feral")) then if (gameDay % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes will run tonight![-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 1) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected tomorrow[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 2) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected in 2 days[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 3) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected in 3 days[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 4) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected in 4 days[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 5) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected in 5 days[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if ((gameDay + 6) % 7 == 0) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Feral hordes are expected in 6 days[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 4") end
if (gmsgvars.words[2] == "server" or gmsgvars.words[2] == "bot" or gmsgvars.words[2] == string.lower(server.botName)) and (gmsgvars.words[3] == nil) and (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "thanks" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "ty" or string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "thx")) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You're welcome " .. gmsgvars.playername .. " <3[-]") else r = rand(18)
if r < 6 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.words[1]:gsub("^%l", string.upper) .. " " .. gmsgvars.playername .. "[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
if string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "love") then l = rand(5) if l == 1 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I know.[-]") end if l == 2 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Thanks =D.[-]") end if l == 3 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I love you too :3[-]") end if l == 4 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]PDA! PDA![-]") end if l == 5 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.words[1]:gsub("^%l", string.upper) .. " " .. gmsgvars.playername .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "pretty") then l = rand(4) if l == 1 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. gmsgvars.words[1]:gsub("^%l", string.upper) .. " " .. gmsgvars.playername .. "[-]") end if l == 2 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I know.[-]") end if l == 3 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Thanks :>[-]") end if l == 4 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]O.o[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "cool") or string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "great")then l = rand(3) if l == 1 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Thanks " .. gmsgvars.playername .. "![-]") end if l == 2 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Indeed.[-]") end if l == 3 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I know.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if r == 6 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Yo no hablo ingls[-]") end
if r == 7 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]You again?[-]") end
if r == 8 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]*sigh* Next![-]") end
if r == 9 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I DIDN'T DO IT! YOU CAN'T PROVE A THING![-]") end
if r == 10 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]OH HEY![-]") end
if r == 11 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No lollygagging[-]") end
if r == 12 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No comment[-]") end
if r == 13 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]OH HAI![-]") end
if r == 14 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Oh rly!?[-]") end
if r == 15 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I'm sorry, " .. server.botName .. " is not in right now. Please leave a message after the beep. BEEP[-]") end
if r == 16 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Hablas espaol?[-]") end
if r == 17 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]o.O[-]") end
if r == 18 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]O.o[-]") end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 5") end
if players[gmsgvars.playerid].newPlayer == true and (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "where") or (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "any"))) and (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "zed") or string.find(gmsgvars.command, "zom")) then r = rand(7) if (r == 2) then r = 3 end if (r == 5) then r = 6 end
send("se " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].id .. " " .. r)
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed 6") end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "server")) and (string.find(gmsgvars.command, "suck") or string.find(gmsgvars.command, "stupid") or string.find(gmsgvars.command, "gay")) then r = rand(4) if (r == 1) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Look who's talking :P[-]") end if (r == 2) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Just ragequit! :)[-]") end if (r == 3) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This is not the server you are looking for. Move along. Move along.[-]") end if (r == 4) then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Let me guess, did someone steal your sweet roll?[-]") end faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug unslashed end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_tracker
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ tracker commands =============
--]]
function gmsg_tracker() calledFunction = "gmsg_tracker"
local debug
debug = false
-- don't proceed if there is no leading slash if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") then faultyGMSG = false return false end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
-- ################### Staff only beyond this point ################ -- Don't proceed if this is a player. Server and staff only here. if (gmsgvars.playername ~= "Server") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return false end end -- ##################################################################
if debug then display ("debug tracker 1\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "skip" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSkip = gmsgvars.number
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 2\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "speed" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSpeed = gmsgvars.number
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 3\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "forward" or gmsgvars.words[1] == "advance" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount + gmsgvars.number igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = false igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStop = true
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 4\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "back" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount - gmsgvars.number igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = false igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStop = true
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 5\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "goto" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "start") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = false igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = 0
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 6\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "goto" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "end") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = 1000000000
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 7\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "go" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "back") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed == true then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = false else igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = false
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 8\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "stop" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
r = rand(100) if r == 99 then message("say [" .. server.chatColour .. "]HAMMER TIME![-]") end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = true igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].following = nil igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].location = nil faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 9\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "go" and gmsgvars.words[2] == nil) then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = false faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 10\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "stop" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "tracking") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then faultyGMSG = false return true end
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = true conn:execute("DELETE FROM memTracker WHERE admin = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = nil
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker 11\n") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "track") or (gmsgvars.words[1] == "next") or (gmsgvars.words[1] == "last") then if (accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) > 2) then message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]This command is restricted[-]") faultyGMSG = false return true end
conn:execute("DELETE FROM memTracker WHERE admin = " .. gmsgvars.playerid)
igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerStopped = false igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = false
if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSpeed == nil then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSpeed = 3 end
if igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSkip == nil then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSkip = 1 end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] ~= "next") and (gmsgvars.words[1] ~= "last") then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCountdown = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSpeed igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = 0 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSteam = 0 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession = 0 id = nil
if string.find(gmsgvars.command, "session") then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "track") + 6, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "session") - 1) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname) igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "session") + 8)
if id ~= nil then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSteam = id end else pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.command, string.find(gmsgvars.command, "track ") + 6) pname = string.trim(pname) id = LookupPlayer(pname)
if id ~= nil then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession = players[id].sessionCount igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSteam = id end end else id = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSteam
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "next") then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession + 1 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = 0 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = false end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "last") then igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession = igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession - 1 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerCount = 1000000000 igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerReversed = true end end
if id ~= nil then conn:execute("INSERT into memTracker (SELECT trackerID, " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " AS admin, steam, timestamp, x, y, z, SESSION , flag from tracker where steam = " .. id .. " and session = " .. igplayers[gmsgvars.playerid].trackerSession .. ")") else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]No player called " .. pname .. " found.[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then display ("debug tracker end\n") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_mail
Script.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ mail commands =============
--]]
function gmsg_mail() calledFunction = "gmsg_mail"
local counter, status, debug
debug = false
if debug then dbug("debug mail") end
-- ################### do not allow remote commands beyond this point ################ if (gmsgvars.playerid == nil) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
-- #################################################################################### -- don't proceed if there is no leading slash or pm if (string.sub(gmsgvars.command, 1, 1) ~= "/") and (not string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, " command 'pm")) then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug mail 1") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "read" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "mail") then counter = 1
if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM mail WHERE recipient = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) else cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM mail WHERE recipient = " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " and status = 0") end
row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do if gmsgvars.number ~= nil then if tonumber(gmsgvars.number) == counter then conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (" .. row.sender .. "," .. row.recipient .. ",'" .. escape(row.message) .. "')") conn:execute("UPDATE mail set status = 1 WHERE id = " .. row.id) end else conn:execute("INSERT INTO messageQueue (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (" .. row.sender .. "," .. row.recipient .. ",'" .. escape(row.message) .. "')") conn:execute("UPDATE mail set status = 1 WHERE id = " .. row.id) end
counter = counter + 1 row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug mail 2") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "list" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "mail") then counter = 1
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM mail WHERE recipient = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do if row.status == "0" then status = " [NEW]" end if row.status == "1" then status = " [READ]" end if row.status == "2" then status = " [SAVED]" end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "](" .. counter .. ") Message from " .. players[row.sender].name .. status .. " " .. string.sub(row.message, 1, 12) .. "..[-]")
counter = counter + 1 row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug mail 3") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "save" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "mail" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then counter = 1
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM mail WHERE recipient = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do if tonumber(gmsgvars.number) == counter then conn:execute("UPDATE mail SET status = 2 WHERE id = " .. row.id) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Message (" .. counter .. ") saved.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug mail 4") end
if (gmsgvars.words[1] == "delete" and gmsgvars.words[2] == "mail" and gmsgvars.number ~= nil) then counter = 1
cursor,errorString = conn:execute("SELECT * FROM mail WHERE recipient = " .. gmsgvars.playerid) row = cursor:fetch({}, "a") while row do if tonumber(gmsgvars.number) == counter then conn:execute("DELETE FROM mail WHERE id = " .. row.id) message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Message (" .. counter .. ") deleted.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
counter = counter + 1 row = cursor:fetch(row, "a") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug mail 5") end
-- #################################################################################### -- don't proceed if not using the console if not string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, " command 'pm") then faultyGMSG = false return false end -- ####################################################################################
if debug then dbug("debug mail 6") end
if (string.find(gmsgvars.words[1], "@") and gmsgvars.words[2] ~= nil) then pname = string.sub(gmsgvars.words[1], 2, string.len(gmsgvars.words[1]) - 1) pname = string.trim(pname)
id = LookupPlayer(pname) msg = string.sub(gmsgvars.oldLine, string.find(gmsgvars.oldLine, gmsgvars.words[1]) + string.len(gmsgvars.words[1]))
if debug then dbug("debug mail msg" .. msg) end
if string.lower(pname) == "admin" then for k,v in pairs(players) do if accessLevel(k) < 3 then if igplayers[k] then message("pm " .. k .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Message from " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. ": " .. msg .. "[-]") else conn:execute("INSERT INTO mail (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (" .. gmsgvars.playerid .. "," .. k .. ", '" .. escape(msg) .. "')") end end end
message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Thank you. An admin will receive your message soon.[-]")
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if id ~= nil then if isFriend(id, gmsgvars.playerid) or accessLevel(gmsgvars.playerid) < 3 then if igplayers[id] then message("pm " .. id .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]Message from " .. players[gmsgvars.playerid].name .. ": " .. msg .. "[-]") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " has received your message.[-]") else conn:execute("INSERT INTO mail (sender, recipient, message) VALUES (" .. gmsgvars.playerid .. "," .. id .. ", '" .. escape(msg) .. "')") message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " will receive your message when they return.[-]") end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]" .. players[id].name .. " has not friended you so you are not allowed to send them private messages yet.[-]") end else message("pm " .. gmsgvars.playerid .. " [" .. server.chatColour .. "]I do not know a player called " .. pname .. "[-]") end
faultyGMSG = false return true end
if debug then dbug("debug mail end") end
end

Script.name: gmsg_friends
Script.script:
